original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas /
translated: Having bound the first vajra,

original: de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo gnyis mchu dang / dpral ba dang spyi bo dang snying gar bzhag cing bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo gnyis mchu dang / dpral ba dang spyi bo dang snying gar bzhag cing bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por bsgom par bya'o //
translated: he should place the two tips of the middle vajra on his lips, forehead, crown, and heart, and meditate on himself as Great Vajradhara.🔽The turning of the wheel is as follows.

analyzed: 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba zhes bya ba de bzhin du / dpal @142a * //
translated: In the same way,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: he should bind the first vajra,🔽and

original: de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo chos kyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul du byas shing /
analyzed: de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo chos kyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul du byas shing /
translated: The tip of the central one is in the manner of turning the wheel of Dharma.

original: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
translated: Reciting “anurāgya yami hūṃ,”

original: zhes bya ba brjod cing kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos bstan par mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba brjod cing kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos bstan par mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine oneself as the tathāgata Amitābha, teaching the Dharma to the great bodhisattvas such as Samantabhadra.

original: rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
translated: The “vajra gem” is as follows: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rin chen byas te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rin chen byas te /
translated: one should make a gem with the tip of the central first vajra,

original: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
translated: reciting “anurāgya yami hūṃ,”

original: zhes bya ba brjod cing rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba brjod cing rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and one should meditate on oneself as having the nature of the jewel family.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pa rnams zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pa rnams zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni /
translated: “All those who perform the desired powers” are as follows.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo //
translated: Just as with the great seal, and so forth, so also with the desired powers.

original: kun du byed pa ni ji ltar mngon par 'dren pa ste ;
analyzed: kun du byed pa ni ji ltar mngon par 'dren pa ste ;
translated: The performance is just as the summoning.

original: / de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
analyzed: / de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi tshul du dbus ma'i rtse mos byas te /🔽aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi tshul du dbus ma'i rtse mos byas te / aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
translated: one should bind the original vajra, and, in the manner of the great seal power, with the tip of the central [finger]

original: zhes bya ba brjod cing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba brjod cing /
translated: recite “anurāgāya hūṃ. ”

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //🔽kun du byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o // kun du byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni /
translated: One should imagine oneself as the nature of the power of the great seal, etc. of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: rnal 'byor ba bzhi char la yang sbyar bar bya'o //🔽de rnams kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba bzhi char la yang sbyar bar bya'o // de rnams kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: This word “performance” should be applied to all four yogas.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate their result, [the Bhagavān] declares, the great vajra holder, etc.

original: de la rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo'i mchu la sogs par bzhag pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: de la rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo'i mchu la sogs par bzhag pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub bo //
translated: By placing it on the tip of the vajra nail, and so on, there is the power of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dngos grub bo //
translated: By the manner of turning the wheel, there is the power of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: rdo rje nor bu'i sbyor ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje rin po che'i rigs kyis dngos grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i sbyor ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje rin po che'i rigs kyis dngos grub bo //
translated: By the manner of the union of the vajra gem, there is the power of the Vajra Ratna family.

original: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi tshul gyis mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi tshul gyis mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the manner of the power of whatever is desired, all supreme powers are accomplished.

original: de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis las bzhi po bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis las bzhi po bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the four actions by the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: da ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis las kyi cho ga dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis las kyi cho ga dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the power of the rite of action by the yoga of Vajra Weapon,

original: rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las so @142b zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje 'dren ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las so @142b zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje 'dren ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: he says, “By the vajra hook, the action of the eye,” and so on. The vajra hook is the pledge seal of Vajra Weapon.

original: de bcings te mig gnyis kyis thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa la sogs pa'i las ni mig 'bras gnyis kyi las yin no //
analyzed: de bcings te mig gnyis kyis thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa la sogs pa'i las ni mig 'bras gnyis kyi las yin no //
translated: The function of the two eyes is to cause all to be passionate, etc.

original: mig g-yon pa dang g-yas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mig g-yon pa dang g-yas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The left and right eyes, etc.

original: rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajra Weapon,

original: rdo rje 'dren ma bcings la rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i snying po brjod cing /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dren ma bcings la rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i snying po brjod cing /
translated: one should bind the vajra leading and recite the essence mantra of Vajra Weapon.

original: mig g-yon pa dang g-yas pa steng du bltas pas rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa thams cad rjes su chags par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: mig g-yon pa dang g-yas pa steng du bltas pas rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa thams cad rjes su chags par byas pa yin no //
translated: By looking up with the left and right eyes, all, beginning with Vajra Acyuta, are caused to be passionate.

original: mig tshur 'dren pas dgug pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mig tshur 'dren pas dgug pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By leading the eyes in, one should summon.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje 'dren ma bcings la mig 'bras tshur 'dren pa dag gis rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa dngos po thams cad dgug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje 'dren ma bcings la mig 'bras tshur 'dren pa dag gis rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa dngos po thams cad dgug par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, by the yoga of Vajra Weapon, one should bind the vajra leading and by leading the eyes in, one should summon all things, beginning with Vajra Acyuta.

original: 'jug pa thams cad 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa thams cad 'jug pa'o //
translated: All entry is entry.

original: zhes bya ba la de bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje 'dren ma bcings las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje 'dren ma bcings las /
translated: As such, by the yoga of Vajra Weapon, bind the vajra hook.

original: rang gi lus la sogs par rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa dngos po thams cad gzhug pa'i bsam pas /
analyzed: rang gi lus la sogs par rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa dngos po thams cad gzhug pa'i bsam pas /
translated: With the intention to enter all things such as one’s body and so on into Vajra Mind and so on,

original: mig 'bras rab tu gzhug par byas la dngos po thams cad 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig 'bras rab tu gzhug par byas la dngos po thams cad 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: fully enter the eyeballs, and all things will enter.

original: chen po'i rdo rje ni dang po'i rdo rje ste /🔽de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'i tshul du /
analyzed: chen po'i rdo rje ni dang po'i rdo rje ste / de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'i tshul du /
translated: The great vajra is the first vajra.🔽From the tip of the central one of those, one should do the repetition of “anurāgya yami hūṃ” in the manner of doing everything.

original: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba'i bzlas pa bya zhing dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa las thams cad sgrub par byed pas /
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba'i bzlas pa bya zhing dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa las thams cad sgrub par byed pas /
translated: By accomplishing all activities through the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: all powers will arise.

original: sgeg mo dga' pa'i rdo rje ma //
analyzed: sgeg mo dga' pa'i rdo rje ma //
translated: The goddess of charm is Rativajra.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i las 'di rnams kho na sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas phyag 'tshal zhing /
analyzed: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i las 'di rnams kho na sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas phyag 'tshal zhing /
translated: Just these activities that were just explained are the homage of the goddess Lalitavajra.

original: phyag btsal nas mi g-yo ba las grub pa'i tshul du byas nas thogs pa med par 'grub pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //🔽de bzhin du gang gi phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya las thams cad don yod cing grub pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha @143a * //
analyzed: phyag btsal nas mi g-yo ba las grub pa'i tshul du byas nas thogs pa med par 'grub pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no // de bzhin du gang gi phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya las thams cad don yod cing grub pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha @143a * //
translated: Having paid homage, one should perform the activities in the manner of Acala, and all activities will be accomplished, since they are accomplished without impediment.🔽Similarly, all powers will be accomplished by the seals and signs of any deity.

original: ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams dang / rang rang gi snying po bzlas pa las thams cad don yod cing 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams dang / rang rang gi snying po bzlas pa las thams cad don yod cing 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Just as all activities are accomplished by the great seal and pledge seal of glorious Vajrasattva, since they are meaningful and accomplished without impediment, in the same way, all activities are meaningful and accomplished by the great seal and so forth of Vajraghanta and so forth, and by reciting their individual essence mantras.

original: de ltar gsangs ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang / las 'grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gsangs ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang / las 'grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the pledges of the maṇḍala of the secret have been taught, as well as the mudrās that accomplish the activities.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dang / mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dang / mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The great mudrā, the dharma mudrā, the karma mudrā, and the offering mudrā should be understood as taught in the Great Maṇḍala.

original: dang po'i nyin re lan cig tu //
analyzed: dang po'i nyin re lan cig tu //
translated: “Every day, once,

original: phyag rgya chen pos snying po bzla //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen pos snying po bzla //
translated: recite the essence mantra with the great mudrā.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar yang gsungs pa'i las rnams byed par 'dod na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar yang gsungs pa'i las rnams byed par 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to perform the activities as taught,

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rnams rang gi lha'i snying po bzla zhing bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rnams rang gi lha'i snying po bzla zhing bcing bar bya'o //
translated: having performed one’s deity yoga just as it is, one should bind the mudrās of one’s deity, reciting the essence mantra of one’s deity.

original: de'i 'og tu rdo rje sems dpa'i las sgrub par byed pas aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba'i nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po bzla zhing las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rdo rje sems dpa'i las sgrub par byed pas aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba'i nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po bzla zhing las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Then, since one accomplishes the activity of Vajrasattva, one should recite the essence mantra together with the essence of the near essence, “Anurāgya mi hūṃ,” and accomplish all activities.

original: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i zlos pa po rnams kyis kyang aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um badzram drashti sa ma ki ma ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i snying po bzla zhing ji ltar gsungs pa'i las🔽rnams bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i zlos pa po rnams kyis kyang aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um badzram drashti sa ma ki ma ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i snying po bzla zhing ji ltar gsungs pa'i las rnams bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The reciters of Vajra Weapon and so on should recite the essence of Vajra Weapon and so on, “Anurāgya mi hūṃ vajra dṛṣṭi samaki mata,” and so on, and accomplish the activities as taught.

original: thams cad yod par grub pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig nye ba'i snying po 'di thams cad yod par sgrub par byed pas na de'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad yod par grub pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig nye ba'i snying po 'di thams cad yod par sgrub par byed pas na de'i phyir /
translated: “ Accomplishing all existence” is because one accomplishes all existence through this near essence.

original: de dang lhan cig tu snying po thams cad bzlas nas thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig tu snying po thams cad bzlas nas thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, one should recite all essence mantras together with it and accomplish all.

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni ji ltar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni ji ltar bshad pa'o //
translated: The vajra of great bliss is as explained.

original: de'i gsang ba'i rtog pa ni sems dpa'i gsang ba'i 'khor gyi rtog pa'i rjes la bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba'i rtog pa ni sems dpa'i gsang ba'i 'khor gyi rtog pa'i rjes la bshad pa'o //
translated: Its secret conception is the conception of the retinue of heroes in the secret place.

original: de'i mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: de'i mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
translated: Its supreme is its excellence.

original: yi ge h'um rang bzhin gyi snying po'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um rang bzhin gyi snying po'o //
translated: It is the essence of the syllable hūṃ.

original: de ci'i phyir phul du byung ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir phul du byung ba yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it supreme?

original: phyi ma zhes bya ba la phyi ma ni mchog tu gyur ba ste /
analyzed: phyi ma zhes bya ba la phyi ma ni mchog tu gyur ba ste /
translated: The subsequent is the supreme,

original: thugs kyi gsang ba ston par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thugs kyi gsang ba ston par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which is the teaching of the secret of mind.🔽The pledge of unfailing achievement

original: sgrub pa don yod dam tshig ni //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgrub pa don yod dam tshig ni // zhes bya ba la /
translated: is the essence of the syllable a.

original: sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub ste /🔽'bras bu yod pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir don yod pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub ste / 'bras bu yod pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir don yod pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: Achievement is the power of the great seal and so forth,🔽because it is the cause of the existent effect, it is the unfailing pledge.

original: don yod pa'i dam @143b tshig yin pa'i phyir de nyid snying pos skad cig dngos grub ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don yod pa'i dam @143b tshig yin pa'i phyir de nyid snying pos skad cig dngos grub ces bya ba yin no //
translated: Because it is the unfailing pledge, it is the essence of the syllable a.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu gcig gi rgyud de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu gcig gi rgyud de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The root tantra is the tantra of the eleven mandalas just explained, and the subsequent tantra is that which teaches the glorious Vajrasattva mandala and so forth, which will be explained below.

original: 'di gnyis dang bcas pa 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di gnyis dang bcas pa 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med pa yin no //
translated: Together with these two, the mandala seal tantra just explained is unsurpassed.

original: de'i ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de'i ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos grub mchog ni 'di bzhin du //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dngos grub mchog ni 'di bzhin du // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The supreme power is like this.

original: rang gi rtog pa'i cho gas phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di ji ltar phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rdzogs par byed pas /
analyzed: rang gi rtog pa'i cho gas phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di ji ltar phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rdzogs par byed pas /
translated: In this way, this seal tantra, with its own imagined ritual, is the perfect means to the power of the great seal and so forth.

translated: The meaning is that all action seals should be produced from the two vajra fists and shown to the disciples.

analyzed: snyems pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The left vajra fist is the “vajra pride” and so forth. Having bound the two vajra fists, one should make the left vajra fist into a “pride” and hold the right vajra fist at one’s heart as if it were a breast. This is the “vajra pride” action seal of the Blessed Vajrasattva.

original: rab tu dga' ba ni bshad zin to ;
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni bshad zin to ;
translated: Supreme joy has been explained.

original: / de brtan par byed cing brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis gang gi phyir rnal 'byor pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba mi phyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //

translated: He makes that firm, and by the power of his effort, he becomes endowed with the indivisible joy of the yogin, because he is unshaken by any discursive thought.

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ster ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o //
translated: Granting all powers means granting all powers, such as the great seal, and so on.

original: 'dis ni don 'di bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni don 'di bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is what it teaches.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par byed pas las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par byed pas las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The action seals should be bound because they accomplish all seals, such as the great seal, and so on.🔽The arrow and bow are the Vajra Weapon.

original: gzhu dang mda' gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'o zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhu 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la rdo rje khu tshur de snying ga'i phyogs su gyen du kha bltas par bzhag nas de'i steng du g-yas pa'i rdo rje

translated: The left vajra fist is in the manner of holding a bow, and that vajra fist is placed above the heart, facing upward. On top of that, the right vajra fist is in the manner of holding an arrow, and that vajra fist is placed on the left vajra fist, facing downward.

original: khu tshur 'og tu blta ba bzhag ste /
analyzed: khu tshur 'og tu blta ba bzhag ste /
translated: The vajra fist is turned downward,

original: slar yang des mda' gsor ba'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni rdo rje yid las byung ba'o //
analyzed: slar yang des mda' gsor ba'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni rdo rje yid las byung ba'o //
translated: and then it is drawn back as if shooting an arrow. This is the vajra mind-born.

original: 'og tu 'khyud pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mchan khung gi 'og tu 'khyud pa 'di ni ki li ki la'i'o //
analyzed: 'og tu 'khyud pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mchan khung gi 'og tu 'khyud pa 'di ni ki li ki la'i'o //
translated: The embrace below is the two vajra fists embracing below the armpits. This is the kilakila.

original: rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba'i tshul du 'dzin pa 'di ni rdo rje dran pa'i'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba'i tshul du 'dzin pa 'di ni rdo rje dran pa'i'o //
translated: The victory banner raised upward is the two vajra fists holding in the manner of raising a victory banner upward. This is the vajra mindfulness.

original: rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis bstod pa //
analyzed: rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis bstod pa //
translated: The two vajra fists are raised in pride.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje @144b khu tshur gnyis bcings te nang du mngon par phyogs shing steng du kha blta ba des lag pa gnyis dku la brten par byas pa ni /

translated: The two vajra fists are bound and turned inward, facing upward. With that, the two hands are placed on the hips.

original: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i'o //
translated: This is the vajra pride.

original: sgeg pa dang bcas pas /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pas /
translated: With a flirtatious🔽gesture,

original: mtha' la sogs pa dgrol bar bya //
analyzed: mtha' la sogs pa dgrol bar bya //

original: zhes pa la sogs pa la khu tshur gnyis bcings nas /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa la khu tshur gnyis bcings nas /

analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa'i sor mo thams cad bkrol nas klog 'gyu ba'i tshul gyis gar bya'o //
translated: one should dance with all the fingers of the hands, beginning with the little fingers, in the manner of a snake uncoiling, with grace.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: g-yas su yongs su bskor bas zhes bya ba ni g-yas su bskor ba ni g-yas su yongs su bskor ba ste /
analyzed: g-yas su yongs su bskor bas zhes bya ba ni g-yas su bskor ba ni g-yas su yongs su bskor ba ste /
translated: Circling to the right means circling to the right, which is circling to the right.

analyzed: des me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta g-yas su bskor ba ni me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta'o //
translated: The flower and so forth kapāla is the flower and so forth kapāla.

original: me tog la sogs ston par byed pa'i ka pu ta ni me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta'i thal mo'o //
analyzed: me tog la sogs ston par byed pa'i ka pu ta ni me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta'i thal mo'o //
translated: The flower and so forth kapāla gesture is the flower and so forth kapāla gesture.

analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni spos dang mar me dang dri ston par byed pa'i ka pu ta shes par bya'o //
translated: The word and so forth indicates the incense, lamp, and scent kapāla gestures.

original: me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta de spyi bo'i phyogs su 'dzin zhing de nas phab la de bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta de spyi bo'i phyogs su 'dzin zhing de nas phab la de bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: One should hold that kapāla of flowers, etc., above one’s head, and then cast it down, and in the same way, with a flirtation, one should cast the offering.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: rdo rje thal mos zhes bya ba'i me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta de phab nas rdo rje thal mo byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje thal mos zhes bya ba'i me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ta de phab nas rdo rje thal mo byas te /
translated: Having cast down that kapāla of flowers, etc., with the vajra-folded-hands, one should make the vajra-folded-hands.

original: byed par gyur pa'i rdo rje thal mo de rnam par 'gyur ba yin nam ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: byed par gyur pa'i rdo rje thal mo de rnam par 'gyur ba yin nam ma yin zhe na /
translated: Is that vajra-folded-hands which is made transformed or not?

analyzed: dkrol ba zhes bya ba ni me tog la sogs pa dkrol ba'i tshul dang bcas pas so //
translated: With the unfurling means with the manner of unfurling the flowers, etc.

analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor ba'o zhes bya ba ni sgeg pa dang bcas pas me tog la sogs pa 'bul ba'i tshul gyis dor bar bya'o //
translated: With a flirtation one should cast the offering means one should cast it with the manner of offering flowers, etc., with a flirtation.

original: de la rdo rje thal mos sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje thal mos sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the casting of the offering with a flirtation by means of the vajra-folded-hands?

original: de bzhin du'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Just so means

original: ji ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i skabs su sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bas bstan pa de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i skabs su 'dir yang bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i skabs su sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bas bstan pa de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i skabs su 'dir yang bya ba yin no //
translated: Just as in the context of the pledge seal, one should offer worship with flirtation, so here in the context of the action seal, one should do the same.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i snying po brjod cing gar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i snying po brjod cing gar bya ste /
translated: This is explained as follows: With the two vajra fists, one should dance, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Weapon as explained above.

original: ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings la spyi bor gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings la spyi bor gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Forming the kapotaka añjali, one should hold it above one’s head.

original: de nas de las phab nas rdo rje thal mo bcings te /
analyzed: de nas de las phab nas rdo rje thal mo bcings te /
translated: Then, lowering it from there, one should form the vajra añjali.

original: de nas rjes la sgeg pa dang bcas pas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas rjes la sgeg pa dang bcas pas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste /
translated: Then, afterward, with flirtation, one should scatter it above, in the manner of offering flowers.

original: @145a * // de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings bar bya'o //
analyzed: @145a * // de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should form the action seal of Vajra Weapon.

original: de nas rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i snying po brjod cing de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bcings la de nyid sgeg mas sbos 'bul gyis tshul gyis 'og tu ldugs pa ste /🔽des nas k'i li la'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i snying po brjod cing de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bcings la de nyid sgeg mas sbos 'bul gyis tshul gyis 'og tu ldugs pa ste / des nas k'i li la'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Kilikili, one should bind the action seal of Vajra Kilikili in the same way, with the vajra palms crossed, pressing down below in the manner of offering a dance.

original: de nas rdo rje dran ma'i snying po brjod cing de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bcings la de nyid sgeg pas mar me 'bul ;🔽ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar nas bskor bar bya ste /🔽rdo rje dran ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //🔽de nas rdo rje snyems ma'i snying po brjod cing de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bcing nas de nyid sgeg pas snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug ba'i tshul du sbyar te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dran ma'i snying po brjod cing de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bcings la de nyid sgeg pas mar me 'bul ; ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar nas bskor bar bya ste / rdo rje dran ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje snyems ma'i snying po brjod cing de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bcing nas de nyid sgeg pas snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug ba'i tshul du sbyar te /
translated: Then, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Smrti, one should bind the action seal of Vajra Smrti in the same way, with the vajra palms crossed, circling with the thumbs joined in the manner of offering a lamp.🔽Then, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Garva, one should bind the action seal of Vajra Garva in the same way, with the vajra palms crossed, extending it to the heart region in the manner of offering perfume.

original: rdo rje thal mo spyi bor gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo spyi bor gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Then, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Mati, one should bind the action seal of Vajra Mati in the same way, with the vajra palms crossed, holding it at the crown of the head in the manner of offering a flower.

original: de nas rdo rje snyems ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje snyems ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should bind the action seal of Vajragarvi.

original: rdo rje yid las byung ba dang / k'i li k'i la dang rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snyems ma'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams gang yin pa de nyid go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha dang / k'i li k'i la dang /
analyzed: rdo rje yid las byung ba dang / k'i li k'i la dang rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snyems ma'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams gang yin pa de nyid go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje mtshon cha dang / k'i li k'i la dang /
translated: The action seals of Vajracaitya, Kaliika, Vajrasmrti, and Vajragarvi are the very same as the seals of Vajravikira, Kaliika,

original: rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang yin par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang yin par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Vajrasmrti, and Vajragarvi, respectively.

original: de ltar rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the action seals of Vajravikira, etc.,

original: da ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the action seals of Vasantavajra, etc.,

original: rdo rje gar ni nang gi mtshams rnams la'o zhes bya ba la rdo rje gar ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can de /
analyzed: rdo rje gar ni nang gi mtshams rnams la'o zhes bya ba la rdo rje gar ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can de /
translated: it is said, “The vajra dance is in the inner corners.” The vajra dance has the characteristics just explained.

original: nang gi mtshams bzhi po la dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi la sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi mtshams bzhi po la dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi la sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the four inner boundaries are the causes for the generation of the four beginning with Vajra Spring, and the four outer boundaries are the causes for the generation of the four beginning with Charm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: phyi'i yo byad me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang ldan pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i yo byad me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang ldan pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The perfection is the external articles, such as flowers, incense, lamps, and perfume.

original: mtshang ba ni de dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mtshang ba ni de dang bral ba'o //
translated: The imperfection is the absence of those.

original: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'i zhes bya ba la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams las phyogs gcig thob pa ni ji snyed pa ste ji snyed pa des kyang ngo //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'i zhes bya ba la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams las phyogs gcig thob pa ni ji snyed pa ste ji snyed pa des kyang ngo //
translated: Or, whatever is obtained means that one part of the articles for worship, such as flowers, is obtained, and whatever is obtained, that much is used.

original: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan ma ste /
translated: The sign of the worship is the sign of the worship with flowers, etc.

original: @145b me tog la sogs pa'i tshul rnams so //
analyzed: @145b me tog la sogs pa'i tshul rnams so //
translated: The manner of flowers, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni spos la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni spos la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The word “etc.” includes incense and so on.

original: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan ma de rnams kyi /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan ma de rnams kyi /
translated: Those signs of worship with flowers and so on

original: dngos grub kun gsol thun mong yin //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gsol thun mong yin //
translated: are the common cause of all powers.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the accomplishment of all karma-consorts such as Vasanta-Vajri,

original: thun mong gi rgyur gyur pa rdo rje yin pas na /
analyzed: thun mong gi rgyur gyur pa rdo rje yin pas na /
translated: they are the common cause of all powers.

original: dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //
translated: They are the cause of the generation of the karma-consorts such as Vasanta-Vajri.

original: dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one know the characteristics of the karma-consorts such as Vasanta-Vajri?

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas mtshan ma yongs su gzung ba zhes bya ba la ji ltar dpyid ka'i rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bstan pa de bzhin du de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang de bzhin
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas mtshan ma yongs su gzung ba zhes bya ba la ji ltar dpyid ka'i rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bstan pa de bzhin du de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang de bzhin
translated: Just as the union with the pledge seal of Vasanta-Vajrī and so forth is explained, so also the union with the action seal of those goddesses is similar.

original: no // 'dis ni 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: no // 'dis ni 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
translated: Form the two vajra fists,

original: dpyid ka rdo rje ma'i snying po brjod cing gar byas te snga ma bzhin du ka pu ta'i thal mo spyi bo'i phyogs su bcing bar bya zhing de nas de phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor bas bcings te me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du🔽gtor bar bya ste /
analyzed: dpyid ka rdo rje ma'i snying po brjod cing gar byas te snga ma bzhin du ka pu ta'i thal mo spyi bo'i phyogs su bcing bar bya zhing de nas de phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor bas bcings te me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste /
translated: recite the essence mantra of Vasanta-Vajrī, dance, and as before form the kapotaka añjali at the crown, then lower it, and with the two vajra fists circle and toss it above as if offering a flower.

original: 'dis ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no ;
analyzed: 'dis ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no ;
translated: This is the action seal of Vasanta-Vajrī.

original: / de nas de bzhin du rdo rje sprin ma'i snying po brjod cing /
analyzed: / de nas de bzhin du rdo rje sprin ma'i snying po brjod cing /

original: rdo rje'i gar bya ste ka pu ta'i thal mo spyi po'i phyogs su bcings la phab ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i gar bya ste ka pu ta'i thal mo spyi po'i phyogs su bcings la phab ste /
translated: One should perform the vajra dance, binding the kapotaka añjali at the crown, and lowering it.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te /
translated: One should bind the two vajra fists,

original: spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis blugs par bya ste /
analyzed: spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis blugs par bya ste /
translated: and offer incense in the manner of pouring.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje sprin ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje sprin ma'i'o //
translated: This is the offering of the vajra cloud.

original: de nas de bzhin du ston ka'i rdo rje ma'i snying po brjod cing spyi bo'i phyogs su ka bu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du ston ka'i rdo rje ma'i snying po brjod cing spyi bo'i phyogs su ka bu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab la /
translated: Then, likewise, one should recite the essence mantra of Hemanta Vajra, bind the kapotaka añjali at the crown, and lower it.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar la bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar la bskor bar bya ste /
translated: One should bind the two vajra fists, and in the manner of offering a lamp, one should join the thumbs and rotate them.

original: 'di ni ston ka'i rdo rje ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ston ka'i rdo rje ma'i'o //
translated: This is the offering of Hemanta Vajra.

original: de bzhin du dgun ma'i snying po brjod cing gar byas la spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dgun ma'i snying po brjod cing gar byas la spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab ste /
translated: Likewise, one should recite the essence mantra of Hemanta, perform the dance, bind the kapotaka añjali at the crown, and lower it.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings shing snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings shing snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang ste /
translated: One should bind the two vajra fists and extend them at the heart center.

original: slar yang rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa /
analyzed: slar yang rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa /
translated: Again, one should bind the two vajra fists,

original: spyi bor gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: spyi bor gzung bar bya ste /
translated: One should hold it to one’s head.

original: 'di ni rdo rje dgun ma'i las kyis phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje dgun ma'i las kyis phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal of the action vajra.

original: rdo rje khu tshur @146a * //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur @146a * //
translated: One should form the two vajra fists,

original: gnyis kyis bskor ba de bzhin du sgeg mo'i snying po brjod cing /
analyzed: gnyis kyis bskor ba de bzhin du sgeg mo'i snying po brjod cing /
translated: and, reciting the essence mantra of the goddess Lāsyā,🔽one should form the kapotaka añjali gesture,

original: ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings shing phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la snying ga'i phyogs su bskor bas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni sgeg mo'i'o //
analyzed: ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings shing phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la snying ga'i phyogs su bskor bas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni sgeg mo'i'o //
translated: and, having lowered it, one should form the two vajra fists and, turning them in the direction of the heart, one should hold them. This is the seal of Lāsyā.

original: de bzhin du bzhad ma'i snying po brjod cing ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du bzhad ma'i snying po brjod cing ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings la /
translated: In the same way, reciting the essence mantra of the goddess Hāsā, one should form the kapotaka añjali gesture,

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bskor bas bcings la dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bskor bas bcings la dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor te /
translated: and, turning it with the two vajra fists, one should hold it in the direction of the mouth, turning it in the manner of a smile.

original: kha'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste 'di ni bzhad ma'i'o //
analyzed: kha'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste 'di ni bzhad ma'i'o //
translated: This is the seal of Hāsā.

original: de bzhin du glu ma'i snying po brjod cing ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha'i phyogs nas gyen du 'dren pa'i tshul du bya ste 'di ni glu ma'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du glu ma'i snying po brjod cing ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha'i phyogs nas gyen du 'dren pa'i tshul du bya ste 'di ni glu ma'i'o //
translated: Likewise, recite the essence mantra of the songstress, bind the kapāla añjali gesture, and then, with the two vajra fists circling, bind them and, as if expelling the words, draw them up from the direction of the mouth.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje gar ma'i snying po brjod cing gar ma'i las byung ba'i ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje gar ma'i snying po brjod cing gar ma'i las byung ba'i ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings nas phab la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor ba bcings te /
translated: Likewise, recite the essence mantra of the vajra dancer, bind the kapāla añjali gesture that arises from the activity of the dancer, and then, with the two vajra fists circling, bind them.

original: gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar byas te 'di ni gar ma'i'o //
analyzed: gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar byas te 'di ni gar ma'i'o //
translated: As if dancing, circle them.

analyzed: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyur byas te /
translated: Then, recite the essence mantra of the vajra hook, bind the two vajra fists, and make the two index fingers into hooks.

original: 'di ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i'o //
translated: This is the vajra hook.

original: de nas rdo rje zhags pa'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje zhags pa'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
translated: Then, recite the essence mantra of the vajra noose, bind the two vajra fists, and make the two middle fingers into a noose.

original: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba gzung bar bya ste 'di ni rdo rje zhags pa'i'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba gzung bar bya ste 'di ni rdo rje zhags pa'i'o //
translated: The right index finger is a hook, holding the extended left index finger: this is the pledge of the vajra noose.

original: de nas lcags sgrog gi snying po rjes su dran zhing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcings pa'i tshul du bya ste /
analyzed: de nas lcags sgrog gi snying po rjes su dran zhing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcings pa'i tshul du bya ste /
translated: Then, recalling the essence mantra of the vajra chain, one forms the two vajra fists and makes a knot with the index finger and the thumb:

original: 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi'o ;
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi'o ;
translated: this is the pledge of the vajra chain.

original: / de'i rjes la rdo rje dril bu'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
analyzed: / de'i rjes la rdo rje dril bu'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
translated: Then, reciting the essence mantra of the vajra bell, one forms the two vajra fists and

analyzed: phan tshun yang dag par sbyor ba 'di ni rdo rje dril bu las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: joins them together: this is the action seal of the vajra bell.

original: 'di rnams kyi don yod ba'i las la grub pa rnams so zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyag rgya chen po rnams dang dam tshig dang chos kyi phyag rgya rnams don yod pa'i las grub pa'i rgyur gyur pa de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyang dngos
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi don yod ba'i las la grub pa rnams so zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyag rgya chen po rnams dang dam tshig dang chos kyi phyag rgya rnams don yod pa'i las grub pa'i rgyur gyur pa de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyang dngos
translated: The meaning of these is: “The accomplishments of the aims of the seal-impression are accomplished.”

original: grub thams cad kyi don du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: grub thams cad kyi don du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Just as the great seals, pledge seals, and Dharma seals are the cause of accomplishing the aims of the seal-impression, so also the action seals are for the sake of all accomplishments.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdud rtsi'i chu bzla'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdud rtsi'i chu bzla'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should recite the nectar water with the vajra fist.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje me tog gi yal ga gcig bzung ste bum @146b pa'i sngags kyis bum pa la mngon par bsngags par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje me tog gi yal ga gcig bzung ste bum @146b pa'i sngags kyis bum pa la mngon par bsngags par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should hold a vajra flower branch with the vajra fist and recite the vase mantra over the vase.🔽The supreme entry is the explanation of the seals.

original: 'jug pa'i mchog ni phyag rgya bshad pa yin zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste de sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i mchog ni phyag rgya bshad pa yin zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste de sngar bshad zin to //
translated: The seal of entry into the maṇḍala was explained previously.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste /
translated: The great maṇḍala is the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: der thams cad kyi slob dpon ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon yin no //
analyzed: der thams cad kyi slob dpon ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon yin no //
translated: There, the master of all of them is the master of the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: de byin gyis brlabs pa ni bstan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de byin gyis brlabs pa ni bstan par bya ba ste /
translated: His consecration is to be explained

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du'o //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du'o //
translated: up to the end of the eon.

original: de'i don du gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de bshad zin to ;
analyzed: de'i don du gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de bshad zin to ;
translated: For that purpose, the mudrā called Secret Commitment has been explained.

original: /'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: /'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The second mudrā called Entrance

original: slob ma 'jug pa'i don du dkyil 'khor brtags la 'jug pa'i phyir bshad pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: slob ma 'jug pa'i don du dkyil 'khor brtags la 'jug pa'i phyir bshad pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa yin no //
translated: is the second mudrā explained for the purpose of the disciple’s entrance into the maṇḍala, having visualized it.

original: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The vajra-binding, etc.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis de bzhin du skye gnas der g-yas pa'i mthe bo 'og tu kha lta pa bcug la btsir te mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu byas la dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis de bzhin du skye gnas der g-yas pa'i mthe bo 'og tu kha lta pa bcug la btsir te mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu byas la dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Having bound the vajra fist, with the left forefinger and thumb, having inserted the right thumb into the vagina, as it were, and having pressed it, and having made a hook with the two forefingers, one should enter the great maṇḍala.

original: yang na sems dpa' gang la 'jug / de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ;
analyzed: yang na sems dpa' gang la 'jug / de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ;
translated: Or else, “whatever hero one enters, he is quickly accomplished.”

original: / zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang la yang 'di bcings nas /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang la yang 'di bcings nas /
translated: In this regard, having bound this [mudra] on whatever maṇḍala of Vairocana, etc.,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i cho gas 'jug na /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i cho gas 'jug na /
translated: one enters by the rite of entering Vairocana, etc.

original: sems dpa' de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang gi dngos grub kyi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor der myur ba kho nar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems dpa' de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang gi dngos grub kyi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor der myur ba kho nar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: That hero, Vairocana, etc., is quickly accomplished in that maṇḍala of Vairocana, etc., with the accomplishment of his own [heroic] powers.

original: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'jug pa'i thun mong gi phyag rgya 'di yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'jug pa'i thun mong gi phyag rgya 'di yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that this is the common seal for entering all mandalas.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma //🔽zhes bya ba la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma // zhes bya ba la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The vajra of supreme joy.🔽The vajra of supreme joy is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma yin no //
translated: The seal of that is the supreme joy vajra woman.

original: rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu blangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu blangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having taken the vajra nectar water with one's vajra fist, and so forth.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs nas des bdag nyid dang slob ma rnams la dbang @147a * //🔽bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs nas des bdag nyid dang slob ma rnams la dbang @147a * //🔽bskur bar bya'o //
translated: In the mandala of Vajrasattva, having taken water from the victorious vase with the vajra fist, one should confer empowerment on oneself and the disciples with that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dang / rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang padma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du padma rigs kyi khu tshur dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i khu tshur dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dang / rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang padma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du padma rigs kyi khu tshur dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i khu tshur dang /
translated: In the maṇḍala of the Tathāgata, the mudrā of the Tathāgata; in the maṇḍala of the Vajra family, the mudrā of the wrathful vajra; in the maṇḍala of the Lotus family, the mudrā of the Lotus family; and in the maṇḍala of the Jewel family, the mudrā of the jewel.

original: phyi rol du rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs te /
analyzed: phyi rol du rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs te /
translated: In the outer maṇḍala of the Vajra family, one should take water with the outer vajra mudrā.

original: rang dang gzhan dag la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan dag la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: One should confer empowerment on oneself and others.

original: de nyid kyis chu de rang 'thungs pa dang gzhan 'thung du bcug nas rnal 'byor ba dang pha rol po yang dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis chu de rang 'thungs pa dang gzhan 'thung du bcug nas rnal 'byor ba dang pha rol po yang dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that very [mudrā], one should drink that water oneself and cause others to drink it, and the practitioner and the other person will be empowered.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Everything and so forth is easy to understand.

original: skyil mo krung gis gar dang mchod pa dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor rnams su rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste mchod pa dang gar dbul bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: skyil mo krung gis gar dang mchod pa dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor rnams su rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste mchod pa dang gar dbul bar bya ba yin no //
translated: In the mandala of Vajrasattva, one should make offerings and dance with the sattva posture, cross-legged, and in the mandalas of the Tathagata, the Vajra Wrath of the Joy Wheel, and the Lord of the World, one should make offerings and dance with the vajra posture, cross-legged.

original: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang mchod pa dang gar dbul ba ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung kho nas bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang mchod pa dang gar dbul ba ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung kho nas bya ba yin no //
translated: In the mandala of the Jewel Family, one should make offerings and dance with the sattva posture, cross-legged.

original: de bas mchod pa rnams ni rdo rje gar gyi sa so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bas mchod pa rnams ni rdo rje gar gyi sa so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, all offerings are made with the vajra dance.

original: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa thams cad du rdo rje gar gyis bya ba yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa thams cad du rdo rje gar gyis bya ba yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: All offerings are made with the vajra dance with the twelve seals, but not with anything else. This is the teaching of the rule.

original: rdo rje'i glu blangs pas rdo rje gang dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa dang gar dbul ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i glu blangs pas rdo rje gang dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa dang gar dbul ba ni /
translated: The vajra song I will offer the vajra refers to the offering of the dance with the twelve seals.

original: 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni //
translated: All the bliss of passion, etc., is collected in your mind,

original: kun bsdus bdag la bde ba stsol mdzod cig / rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag bstan mdzod //
analyzed: kun bsdus bdag la bde ba stsol mdzod cig / rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag bstan mdzod //
translated: so please grant me bliss, O Vajrasattva, quickly show me your face.

original: bdag dgyes mdzad dang bde mchog grub la 'dud //
analyzed: bdag dgyes mdzad dang bde mchog grub la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, who are pleased with me, who are supreme bliss, and who are accomplished.

original: ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu len cing bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu len cing bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, singing this vajra song, one should perform the dance.

original: de ltar phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa rnams kyi thun mong gi cho ga bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa rnams kyi thun mong gi cho ga bstan nas /

analyzed: da ni gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi po'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the specific characteristics of the four secret offerings,

analyzed: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa rnams dbul zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, offer the vajra dance offerings, and so forth.

analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje'i glu len @147b cing /
translated: Having formed the two vajra fists as before, one should sing the vajra song and

original: ji skad bshad pa'i gar byas te ka pu ta'i thal mo kha sbyor spyi bor bcings te de las phab la rdo rje thal mo byas nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang bcas pas steng du gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i gar byas te ka pu ta'i thal mo kha sbyor spyi bor bcings te de las phab la rdo rje thal mo byas nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang bcas pas steng du gtor bar bya'o //
translated: One should dance as explained, and having bound the joined palms of the kapotaka mudra on one’s crown, having lowered it, and having made the vajra-folded hands, one should scatter [the flowers] above with a gesture of offering flowers.

original: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems ma bcing par bya'o ;
analyzed: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems ma bcing par bya'o ;
translated: Then, with both vajra fists one should bind the Vajrasattva mudra, the vajra-conceit.

analyzed: / de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /

analyzed: 'di ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya dang po yin no //

analyzed: slar yang rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas rdo rje'i glu len cing gar byas te /

analyzed: de nas rdo rje bran ma'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byas te 'di ni gsang ba'i mchod pa gsum pa'o //
