original: de nas yang bskor zhing mkhu tshor dang / spyi bor gzung ba byas nas 'dis mchod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas yang bskor zhing mkhu tshor dang / spyi bor gzung ba byas nas 'dis mchod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having made the mudrā of the Tathāgatas and having placed it on the head, one will obtain the power of all offerings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub byas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub byas na /
translated: Having made the threatening mudrā with both Tathāgata fists,

original: 'dis gdul ba thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis gdul ba thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will subdue all those who are difficult to subdue.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis sbyin pa'i tshul byas na 'dis byang chub kyi spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis sbyin pa'i tshul byas na 'dis byang chub kyi spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having made the mudrā of generosity with both Tathāgata fists, one will complete the conduct of awakening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying ga'i phyogs su gzung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying ga'i phyogs su gzung ste /
translated: Having made the mudrā of the two Tathāgata fists, holding the left fist at the heart,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur g-yas pa brkyang nas sa la reg par byas na 'dis bdud thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur g-yas pa brkyang nas sa la reg par byas na 'dis bdud thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
translated: and having extended the right Tathāgata fist and touched the ground, one will conquer all demons.

original: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for the “angry left index finger” and so on,

original: byang chub mchog bcings nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms nas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub mchog bcings nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms nas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Having bound the supreme enlightenment, and having meditated on oneself as Vairocana, one becomes all the Tathagatas by this.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa 'og tu bcings nas skyil mo krung ngo zhes bya ba la /🔽rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcings la mthe bo brtan pa'i skyil mo krung du byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa 'og tu bcings nas skyil mo krung ngo zhes bya ba la / rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcings la mthe bo brtan pa'i skyil mo krung du byas te /
translated: Having bound the vajra-bond below, one should sit cross-legged.🔽Having bound the vajra-bond inside, one should sit cross-legged with the thumbs firm, and the two index fingers joined at the tips.

original: mdzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar ba'i rtse mo 'dir rdo rje sku mchog shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar ba'i rtse mo 'dir rdo rje sku mchog shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should know this as the supreme vajra-body. This is the meaning.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
translated: From the second section of the root tantra called The Arising of the Perfection of Wisdom from the extensive explanation of the Shriparamādya Tantra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: the explanation of the mandala seal of the Tathagata is complete.

original: // / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the mandala seal of the Tathagata, now, in order to teach the seal imagination of the Vajra Wrath of the Joyous,

original: de nas rdo rje'i rigs @159b kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i rigs @159b kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he declares, Then, the extensive ritual of the seal tantra of the Vajra family,

original: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
translated: the word then refers to the present occasion,

original: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ston pa'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ston pa'i skabs su'o //
translated: the occasion for teaching the characteristics of the seals.

original: rdo rje'i rigs te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs te /
translated: The Vajra family

original: de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'o //
translated: arises from it,

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: because

original: phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it arises from the vajra of Vajrapani.

original: rdo rje'i rigs de'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs de'i phyag rgya ni /
translated: The seal of that Vajra family

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: is of the nature of the great seal, etc.

original: de'i rgyud ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyud ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Its tantra is as before.

original: de'i cho ga rgyas la ni rgyun no //
analyzed: de'i cho ga rgyas la ni rgyun no //
translated: Its extensive ritual is the extensive ritual.

original: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The seal of entry is called the Vajra Wrath of the Joyous.

original: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The great seal of the wrathful one Humkara of the great joy of the Bhagavat is called the wrathful one of the great joy.

original: de 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: de 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the seal for entering the mandala of the Vajra family.

original: dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid de zhes bya ba la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen po nyid ni mdzub mo g-yas pa'i lcags kyu ma ste /
analyzed: dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid de zhes bya ba la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen po nyid ni mdzub mo g-yas pa'i lcags kyu ma ste /
translated: That very same seal of summoning is the hook of the right forefinger of the great seal of the wrathful one of the great joy.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal for summoning all the deities of the mandala.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa sngar bshad pa'i spyan drang ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa sngar bshad pa'i spyan drang ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, the Bhagavat, the wrathful one of the great joy, together with his retinue, should be caused to enter the mandala with the previously explained mantra of summoning.

original: phyag rgya chen po de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The great seal should be made in the same way.

original: bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa bris pa'i cho gar phyag rgya chen po ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa bris pa'i cho gar phyag rgya chen po ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should bind the great seal just as it is taught in the procedure for drawing the Blessed One, the wrathful Vajra of Great Joy together with the retinue.

original: dam tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The pledge is the pledge seal.

original: 'og tu rdo rje bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings te /
analyzed: 'og tu rdo rje bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings te /
translated: The vajra binding below is the vajra binding bound inside.

original: sor mo thams cad nang du bcings te /
analyzed: sor mo thams cad nang du bcings te /
translated: All the fingers are bound inside.

original: der mthe bo rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings nas steng du kha bltas par byas la /
analyzed: der mthe bo rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings nas steng du kha bltas par byas la /
translated: There, the vajra of the thumbs is as follows: Having bound the vajra binding inside as explained, one should turn it upward.

original: sor mo thams cad phan tshun du yang dag par sbyar te 'bar ba ltar gzung ba byas la /
analyzed: sor mo thams cad phan tshun du yang dag par sbyar te 'bar ba ltar gzung ba byas la /
translated: Having joined all the fingers together, one should hold it as if blazing.

original: mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing srin lag dang dbus ma'i sor mo dag ni nang du gzung bar byas nas 'dis ni rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri zhes bya ba la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing srin lag dang dbus ma'i sor mo dag ni nang du gzung bar byas nas 'dis ni rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri zhes bya ba la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste
translated: The tips of the two thumbs are joined together, and the ring fingers and middle fingers are held inside. This is the pledge seal of Great Vajradhara called the “Vajra Wrathful One’s Tīrthika.”

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: It accomplishes Great Vajradhara.

original: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba la rdo rje khro bo yid las byung ba'i dam tshig @160a * //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba la rdo rje khro bo yid las byung ba'i dam tshig @160a * //
translated: “The others are also like that.” The pledge seal of the Vajra Wrathful Mind is

original: phyag rgya ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin no //
translated: the pledge seal of the Vajra Born of Mind, and so on.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following.

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu phyi rol du mngon par phyogs pa dang / mthe bos 'khyud pa dang mthe bo gnyis kha phye la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dbus ma dag gi rtse mo phan tshun 'dren cing mtha' ma dang srin lag mnyam par byas te kha phye la rdo rje chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu phyi rol du mngon par phyogs pa dang / mthe bos 'khyud pa dang mthe bo gnyis kha phye la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dbus ma dag gi rtse mo phan tshun 'dren cing mtha' ma dang srin lag mnyam par byas te kha phye la rdo rje chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /
translated: First, having bound the vajra fist, the two index fingers are facing outward like hooks, the two thumbs are embracing, the two thumbs are opened, the two index fingers are in the center, the tips of the two index fingers touch each other, the tips of the two middle fingers are extended, the two ring fingers are even, the two little fingers are opened, and the vajra crocodile banner is raised.

original: brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa dang / rdo rje thal mo bskor ba'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa dang / rdo rje thal mo bskor ba'i phyag rgya ni /
translated: The mudra of the vajra fist circling the two thighs is as follows:

original: gyen du gtor dang thur du blugs //
analyzed: gyen du gtor dang thur du blugs //
translated: Upwardly toss and downwardly pour,🔽the thumbs touch and circle,🔽fully extend and apply,🔽circle and rest on the crown,

original: mthe bo sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang // bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang // bskor nas snying gar gzhag par bya //
analyzed: mthe bo sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang // bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang // bskor nas snying gar gzhag par bya //
translated: circle and place on the heart,🔽fully circle and explain,🔽expel from the mouth and upwardly,

original: yongs su bskor zhing bshad pa dang // kha las gyen du 'byin pa dang // de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su bskor zhing bshad pa dang // kha las gyen du 'byin pa dang // de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba'o //
translated: and likewise, circle with dance.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
translated: Having bound the vajra fist,🔽the two index fingers are hooks,

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang // g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas kyis gzung //🔽mdzub mo mthe bo'i 'ching ba dang // mthe bo mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag / ces bya ba ni rnams rdo rje khro bo yid las byung ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang // g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas kyis gzung // mdzub mo mthe bo'i 'ching ba dang // mthe bo mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag / ces bya ba ni rnams rdo rje khro bo yid las byung ba nas brtsams te /
translated: and the left index finger is held by the right.🔽The index finger is bound to the thumb,🔽and the thumb is placed in the palm.🔽These are the pledge seals of Vajra Wrathful Mind and so forth,

original: rdo rje khro bo dril bu'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo dril bu'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: up to Vajra Wrathful Bell.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya ni de rnams nyid do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya ni de rnams nyid do zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Dharma seals are just those.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor che po las gsungs pa nyid 'di ltar lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor che po las gsungs pa nyid 'di ltar lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The pledge seals of all the deities are just those taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: de yang 'di dag yin te ho zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi'o ;
analyzed: de yang 'di dag yin te ho zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi'o ;
translated: They are as follows: Hoḥ is the Blessed One’s.

original: / bhid ces bya ba ni khro bo yid las byung ba'i'o //
analyzed: / bhid ces bya ba ni khro bo yid las byung ba'i'o //
translated: Bhī is the pledge seal of Mind-born Wrath.

original: h'um zhes bya ba ni khro bo k'i li k'i la'i'o //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba ni khro bo k'i li k'i la'i'o //
translated: Hūṃ is the pledge seal of Kali Kali Wrath.

original: dhrid ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje dran ma'i'o //
analyzed: dhrid ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje dran ma'i'o //
translated: Dhṛṭ is the pledge seal of Vajra-mind Wrath.

original: h'um zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje snyems pa'i lhag ma rnams kyi yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams nyid chos kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje snyems pa'i lhag ma rnams kyi yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams nyid chos kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The syllable HŪṀ is the Dharma-mudra of all the remaining wrathful Vajra-Darts, etc.

original: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Action-mudras are the same,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid khro bo rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid khro bo rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams su shes par bya'o //
translated: one should know that the Action-mudras of the wrathful Delightful Vajra, etc. are the same as those taught in the Great Maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.🔽The difference is in the fists,

original: khu tshur gyi khyad par ro zhes bya ba @160b la des rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba yin pa la 'dis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba ste 'di ni khyad par yin no //
analyzed: khu tshur gyi khyad par ro zhes bya ba @160b la des rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba yin pa la 'dis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba ste 'di ni khyad par yin no //
translated: that is, they arise from the two Vajra-fists, while these arise from the two wrathful fists; this is the difference.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub bo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub bo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The two forefingers of the two Vajra-fists are threatening,

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub kyi tshul gyis bzung la so sor bsgreng bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub kyi tshul gyis bzung la so sor bsgreng bar bya ste /
translated: Holding the two vajra fists with the two index fingers in the form of threatening forefingers, one should raise them up individually.

original: 'di ni khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the mudra of the two wrathful vajra fists.

original: dam tshig las byung ba ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba la ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la de gnyis su byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang
analyzed: dam tshig las byung ba ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba la ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la de gnyis su byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang
translated: “The pledge mudra is the same way” means that just as in the mandala of Vajrasattva the pledge vajra fist is formed, and having made that into two, the mudra of the two vajra fists arises, so it is here as well.

original: ngo // 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ngo // 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following.

original: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te de gnyis su byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas nas 'di'i mdzub mo gnyis gzung bar byas na khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te de gnyis su byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas nas 'di'i mdzub mo gnyis gzung bar byas na khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Forming the pledge vajra fist, having made that into two, having made the two vajra fists, one should hold the two index fingers, and the two wrathful vajra fists arise.

original: 'dis las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With this one should bind the action mudras.

original: de dag kyang 'di yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang 'di yin te /
translated: And those are as follows.

original: g-yon pa'i bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste /
translated: One should hold the left fist with a proud manner, as if entrusting it.

original: 'di ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the action seal of the wrathful one of the Vajra of Joy.

original: mda' gzhu gtod pa ni khro bo rdo rje yid las byung ba'i'o //
analyzed: mda' gzhu gtod pa ni khro bo rdo rje yid las byung ba'i'o //
translated: The entrusting of the bow and arrow is that of the wrathful mind-born Vajra.

original: 'og tu 'khyud pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i'o //
analyzed: 'og tu 'khyud pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i'o //
translated: The embrace below is that of the wrathful Vajra Kalikeya.

original: rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rdo rje dran pa'i'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rdo rje dran pa'i'o //
translated: The raised victory banner is that of the Vajra Smrti.

original: snyems pa gnyis gtod pa khro bo'i snyems pa'i'o //
analyzed: snyems pa gnyis gtod pa khro bo'i snyems pa'i'o //
translated: The entrusting of the two proud ones is that of the wrathful one of pride.

original: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis po de nyid sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa dgrol bas /
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis po de nyid sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa dgrol bas /
translated: Those two wrathful fists, with a flirtatious manner, release the end and so on.

original: glog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis yongs su bskor bas spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings te phab la /
analyzed: glog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis yongs su bskor bas spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo bcings te phab la /
translated: Circling with the dance of lightning, one forms the kapotaka añjali at the crown and lowers it.

original: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
translated: One circles and binds the two wrathful fists.

original: me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste 'di ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma'i'o //
analyzed: me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste 'di ni dpyid ka rdo rje ma'i'o //
translated: As if offering a flower, one tosses it above. This is that of the Vajra Vasanta.

original: de nas de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gar byas la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gar byas la /
translated: Then, likewise, make the gesture of wrathful fists,

original: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
translated: and turning the two wrathful fists,

original: spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu blugs par bya ste /
analyzed: spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu blugs par bya ste /
translated: bind them and pour them out below in the manner of offering incense.

original: 'di ni rdo rje sprin ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje sprin ma'i'o //
translated: This is the vajra cloud.

original: de nas de bzhin du khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo mnyam pas bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo mnyam pas bskor bar bya ste /
translated: Then, likewise, turning the two wrathful vajra fists, bind them and, in the manner of offering a lamp, turn them with the thumbs even.

original: 'di ni ston ka rdo rje @161a * //
analyzed: 'di ni ston ka rdo rje @161a * //
translated: This is the vajra autumn.

original: ma'i 'o // de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: ma'i 'o // de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Likewise, binding the two wrathful fists, turn them in the manner of laughter and hold them at the mouth.

original: 'di ni bzhad ma'i 'o //🔽de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
analyzed: 'di ni bzhad ma'i 'o // de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
translated: This is the vajra laughter.

original: ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste 'di ni glu ma'i 'o //
analyzed: ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste 'di ni glu ma'i 'o //
translated: Likewise, binding the two wrathful fists, in the manner of emitting speech, raise them up from the mouth. This is the vajra song.

original: de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar byas te 'di ni gar ma'i'o //🔽gar dang bral ba'i khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas la 'di ni khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i'o //🔽khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyu g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng bas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni khro bo rdo rje zhags pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar byas te 'di ni gar ma'i'o // gar dang bral ba'i khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas la 'di ni khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i'o // khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyu g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng bas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni khro bo rdo rje zhags pa'i 'o //
translated: Likewise, form the two wrathful fists and rotate them in the manner of dance; this is the dance mudra.🔽Form the two wrathful fists without the dance and make two hooks with the two index fingers; this is the wrathful vajra hook mudra.🔽Form the two wrathful fists and make a hook with the right index finger, holding it with the extended left index finger; this is the wrathful vajra noose mudra.

original: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcing bar bya ste 'di ni khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog gi'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcing bar bya ste 'di ni khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog gi'o //
translated: Form the two wrathful fists and bind with the index finger and thumb; this is the wrathful vajra fetter mudra.

original: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te phan tshun yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te phan tshun yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Form the two wrathful fists and join them together.

original: 'di ni khro bo rdo rje dril bu'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no /
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo rdo rje dril bu'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no /
translated: This is the wrathful vajra bell action mudra.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rnams bstan nas da ni las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rnams bstan nas da ni las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the maṇḍala mudras, now, in order to teach the mudras that accomplish the collection of activities,

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Then, the activity mudras,”

original: 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: and so on. The activity mudras are the mudras that accomplish the activities of conquering all three worlds and so on.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: “They arise from Vajra Hūṃkara” means

original: 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung bar gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung bar gzung bar bya'o //
translated: that the mudras that accomplish conquering all three worlds and so on should be understood to arise from Vajra Hūṃkara.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is Vajra Hūṃkara like?

original: lag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
analyzed: lag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
translated: “The vajra hand” and so on.🔽Having bound the two vajra fists,

original: rdo rje lag pa mnyam sbyar nas //
analyzed: rdo rje lag pa mnyam sbyar nas //
translated: the two vajra hands are joined together.

original: mthe chung lcags kyu bcings byas te /
analyzed: mthe chung lcags kyu bcings byas te /
translated: Binding the hook of the little fingers,

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyi sdigs mdzub ni //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyi sdigs mdzub ni //
translated: the threatening forefingers

original: 'jig rten gsum rgyal bya ba yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum rgyal bya ba yin //
translated: is called “Conquering the Three Worlds.”

original: de ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
translated: This is the Vajra Humkara.

original: 'dis 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one attains the power of conquering the entire triple world.

original: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo zhes bya ba @161b la ;
analyzed: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo zhes bya ba @161b la ;
translated: “The left forefinger”

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings nas g-yon pa'i mthe mdzub kyis bsgrub bya la sdigs mdzub bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings nas g-yon pa'i mthe mdzub kyis bsgrub bya la sdigs mdzub bya ste /
translated: means that, having bound the Vajra Humkara, one should threaten the victim with the left forefinger.

original: 'dis sems can gyi khams thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis sems can gyi khams thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one conquers the entire realm of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad g-yon pa brkyang bas gnas pa zhes ba pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad g-yon pa brkyang bas gnas pa zhes ba pa la /
translated: “The left leg extended, standing in the Vajra Humkara”

original: ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la g-yon brkyang ba'i lta stangs kyis 'dug nas bsgrub bya la sdigs mdzub byas nas 'dis ni khams gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la g-yon brkyang ba'i lta stangs kyis 'dug nas bsgrub bya la sdigs mdzub byas nas 'dis ni khams gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: means that, having bound the Vajra Humkara as explained, one should stand with the left leg extended, threatening the victim with the gaze. By this, one conquers the entire triple world.

original: mdzub mo'i rdo rjes sdigs mdzub po //
analyzed: mdzub mo'i rdo rjes sdigs mdzub po //
translated: The threatening mudra is with the vajra finger.

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te /
translated: In this way, having bound the Vajra Humkara,

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba byas nas des sdigs mdzub byas nas dgug pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad 'grub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba byas nas des sdigs mdzub byas nas dgug pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad 'grub par byed pa yin no //
translated: one should make the tip of the two fingers touch each other, and with that threatening mudra, one should perform all activities such as summoning.🔽By the breath of the nose and the syllable hum,

original: sna'i dbugs dang yi ge h'um gis so zhes bya ba la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te sna'i dbugs dang yi ge h'um gis thams cad btung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sna'i dbugs dang yi ge h'um gis so zhes bya ba la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te sna'i dbugs dang yi ge h'um gis thams cad btung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: having bound the Vajra Humkara, by the breath of the nose and the syllable hum, all will be summoned.

original: khros bas yi ge aa sbyar par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: khros bas yi ge aa sbyar par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the wrathful one, the syllable a is applied.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te khros pas yi ge aa brjod par byas na 'dis thams cad bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te khros pas yi ge aa brjod par byas na 'dis thams cad bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having bound the Vajra Humkara, by the wrathful one, the syllable a is uttered. By this, all will fall.

original: ha ha dgod par bya zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ha ha dgod par bya zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should laugh ha ha.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings he ha ha zhes dgod par byas nas 'dis thams cad gzhon par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings he ha ha zhes dgod par byas nas 'dis thams cad gzhon par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Having bound the Vajra Humkara, one should laugh ha ha. By this, all will be subdued.

original: / snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'i zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'i zhes bya ba la /
translated: By meditating on the vajra at the heart, the great vajra-mudra.

original: rang gi snying gar khro bo rdo rje rtse bzhi pa bsgom zhing /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar khro bo rdo rje rtse bzhi pa bsgom zhing /
translated: Meditating on the four-pointed wrathful vajra at one’s heart,

original: bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas las thams cad dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas las thams cad dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: binding the great mudra of the wrathful vajra of the Blessed One, one accomplishes all the desired accomplishments of all activities.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the chapter on the great mudra of the wrathful vajra of the Blessed One, called the “Arising of the Perfection of Wisdom” from the extensive commentary on the Shriparamādya Tantra called the “Source of Wisdom,” from the second part of the root tantra.

original: // / de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: // / de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Having thus taught the chapter on the mudras of the vajra family, now, in order to teach the chapter on the mudras of the lotus family,

original: de nas padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i chos rgyas pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i chos rgyas pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Then, he taught the Tantra of the Extensive Ritual of the Seal of the Lotus Family.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word “then” is as before.

original: padma'i ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ste de'i rigs ni padma'i rigs so //🔽de'i phyag rgya chen po dang dam @162a * //
analyzed: padma'i ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ste de'i rigs ni padma'i rigs so // de'i phyag rgya chen po dang dam @162a * //
translated: The Lotus Family is Vajra Lokeśvara.

original: tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: Its seals are the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal.

original: de'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni sgra'i tshogs so //
analyzed: de'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni sgra'i tshogs so //
translated: The extensive ritual of that is the collection of words.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The “tathāgata-vajra index fingers” and so forth. The first vajra that arises from the vajra-binding is the tathāgata-vajra.

original: mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba bkug la padma 'dab ma gnyis kyi rnam pas gar byas la snying ga'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba bkug la padma 'dab ma gnyis kyi rnam pas gar byas la snying ga'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The two index fingers are extended and bent, and one should hold them at the heart in the form of two lotus petals, dancing.

original: 'di ni rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the mudra of entering the mandala of Lokeśvara called the vajra lotus.

original: 'di nyid mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya'o //
translated: With the same mudra, the two index fingers in the form of hooks, one should invite Vajra Lokeśvara with retinue with the mantra of invitation.🔽All the mudras such as the great mudra and so forth are the same.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin du'o zhes bya ba la ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya rnams bstan pa
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin du'o zhes bya ba la ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya rnams bstan pa
translated: Just as in the great mandala of Vajrasattva, the great mudras and so forth of Śrī Vajrasattva and so forth are taught,

original: de bzhin 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
translated: so it should be known here as well.🔽The special pledges and the special fists.

original: dam tshig gi khyad par dang khu tshur gyi khyad par ro zhes bya ba la 'dir yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya khyad par can du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi khyad par dang khu tshur gyi khyad par ro zhes bya ba la 'dir yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya khyad par can du shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the special pledge mudra should be known.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / las kyi phyag rgya rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i khu tshur gyi khyad par yang shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / las kyi phyag rgya rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i khu tshur gyi khyad par yang shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: One should also know the special fists that are the causes for generating the great seal and the action seal.

original: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang / khu tshur gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang / khu tshur gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the special pledge seal and the special fist,

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says the “seal of the sprouting palm,” and so on.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mos bcings nas mthe bo gnyis mthe chung gnyis kha phye bar byas la /
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mos bcings nas mthe bo gnyis mthe chung gnyis kha phye bar byas la /
translated: Having bound with the sprouting palm, one should open the two thumbs and two pinkies,

original: padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste /
translated: and hold them in the manner of four open lotus petals.

original: 'di ni padma chen po zhes bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni padma chen po zhes bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the great lotus pledge seal of Noble Avalokiteśvara.

original: thams cad bcing ba ni ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad bcing ba ni ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: “All bound as before” means

original: padma yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las byung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan nas khu tshur @162b gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: padma yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las byung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan nas khu tshur @162b gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The binding of the pledge seal that arises from the opened petals of the lotus born from the mind, and so on, should be known in the manner taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: khu tshur gyi khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis dang dbus ma gnyis mnyam por byas la /
analyzed: khu tshur gyi khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis dang dbus ma gnyis mnyam por byas la /
translated: Thus, having taught the distinctions of the pledge seals, in order to teach the distinctions of the fists, [the Bhagavān] declares, the distinctions of the fists, and so on.🔽The distinctions of the fists.🔽Having bound the vajra-binding, the two index fingers and the two middle fingers should be made even.

original: mthe bo'i rtse mor rang rang gi dbus ma dang mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar la gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: mthe bo'i rtse mor rang rang gi dbus ma dang mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar la gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The tips of the thumbs should be joined to the tips of the middle and index fingers.

original: 'di ni padma'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni padma'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the pledge seal of the lotus fist.

original: 'di gnyis su byas la phyag rgya chen po dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis su byas la phyag rgya chen po dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Having made these two, one should bind the great seal and the action seal.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following:

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te bsnyems par byas nas g-yas pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te gsor la gtod pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gar 'dzin par bya ste /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te bsnyems par byas nas g-yas pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te gsor la gtod pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gar 'dzin par bya ste /
translated: Having formed the two lotus fists, one should take up the vajra lotus with the left lotus fist, and having assumed the proud pose, one should take up the five-pronged vajra with the right lotus fist, and holding it as if one were offering it, one should hold it at one's heart.

original: 'di ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po yin no //
translated: This is the great seal of Vajra Lokeśvara.

original: 'di bzhin du padma'i yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi phyag rgya chen po bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di bzhin du padma'i yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi phyag rgya chen po bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bcing bar bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should bind the great seals of Padma-manojava and so forth, following the written instructions.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni padma chen po zhes bya bas bstan zin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni padma chen po zhes bya bas bstan zin to //
translated: The pledge seal of the Blessed One Vajra Lokeśvara has already been taught by the one called Great Lotus.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyir rtse mo phyi rol du phyogs par bkug par byas te 'di ni padma'i yid las byung ba'i'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyir rtse mo phyi rol du phyogs par bkug par byas te 'di ni padma'i yid las byung ba'i'o //
translated: The lotus born from the mind: make the añjali gesture of opening a lotus, and bend the tips of the two index fingers outward.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bcings te mthe bo gnyis pa'i skyil mo krung gis 'khyud par bya ste /🔽'di ni padma k'i li k'i la'i'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bcings te mthe bo gnyis pa'i skyil mo krung gis 'khyud par bya ste / 'di ni padma k'i li k'i la'i'o //
translated: The lotus karikali: make the añjali gesture of opening a lotus, and embrace with the two thumbs.🔽The lotus karikali: make the añjali gesture of opening a lotus, and with the right index finger hook the tip of the left middle finger, and with the left index finger hook the tip of the right middle finger.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i dbus ma'i rtse mo gzung ba dang / g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yas pa'i dbus ma'i rtse mor gsung bar byas la mthe bo gnyis so sor bsgreng ste srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing tha ma gnyis so sor rab tu phyir brkyang nas gzung bar byas te /🔽'di ni padma dran pa'i'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i dbus ma'i rtse mo gzung ba dang / g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yas pa'i dbus ma'i rtse mor gsung bar byas la mthe bo gnyis so sor bsgreng ste srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing tha ma gnyis so sor rab tu phyir brkyang nas gzung bar byas te /🔽'di ni padma dran pa'i'o //
translated: The lotus mindfulness: extend the two thumbs separately, join the tips of the two ring fingers, and extend the tips of the two little fingers separately.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bskor nas brla gnyis la gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma snyems ma'i'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bskor nas brla gnyis la gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma snyems ma'i'o //
translated: The two fists of the blooming lotus are held to the two thighs. This is the lotus conceit.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bskor zhing bcings la steng du gtor bar bya ste 'di ni dpyid ka'i rdo rje ma'i'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bskor zhing bcings la steng du gtor bar bya ste 'di ni dpyid ka'i rdo rje ma'i'o //
translated: The two fists of the blooming lotus are bound and thrown upward. This is the spring vajra.

original: de nyid spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu blugs par byas te 'di ni sprin ma'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu blugs par byas te 'di ni sprin ma'i'o //
translated: That same [mudra] is placed below in the manner of offering incense. This is the cloud.

original: de nyid mar me @163a * //
analyzed: de nyid mar me @163a * //
translated: That same [mudra] is held in the manner of offering a lamp.

original: 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar zhing bskor ba'i rnam pas gzung bar byas te /
analyzed: 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar zhing bskor ba'i rnam pas gzung bar byas te /
translated: The thumbs are joined and held in the manner of a circle.

original: 'di ni ston ka rdo rje ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ston ka rdo rje ma'i'o //
translated: This is the autumn vajra.

original: de nyid snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang zhing dris byug pa'i tshul du rab tu sbyar zhing bskor la spyi bor gzung bar bya ste 'di ni dgun ma'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang zhing dris byug pa'i tshul du rab tu sbyar zhing bskor la spyi bor gzung bar bya ste 'di ni dgun ma'i'o //
translated: That same [mudra] is extended to the heart region and applied in the manner of anointing with perfume. It is circled and held to the head. This is the winter.

original: padma'i thal mo bskor zhing snying ga'i phyogs su gzung ba ste 'di ni sgeg ma'i'o //
analyzed: padma'i thal mo bskor zhing snying ga'i phyogs su gzung ba ste 'di ni sgeg ma'i'o //
translated: The lotus fists are circled and held to the heart region. This is the flirtatious.

original: padma'i thal mo sbyar zhing dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la kha'i thad kar gzung bar byas te 'di ni bzhad pa ma'i'o //🔽padma'i thal mo bskor ba dag 'byin pa'i tshul kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste 'di ni glu ma'i'o //
analyzed: padma'i thal mo sbyar zhing dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la kha'i thad kar gzung bar byas te 'di ni bzhad pa ma'i'o // padma'i thal mo bskor ba dag 'byin pa'i tshul kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste 'di ni glu ma'i'o //
translated: Having made the lotus añjali, one should hold it at the mouth in the manner of laughing. This is the Lotus Laughter.🔽Having made the lotus añjali, one should raise it up from the mouth in the manner of singing. This is the Lotus Song.

original: padma'i thal mo bskor zhing gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni padma gar ma'i'o //
analyzed: padma'i thal mo bskor zhing gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni padma gar ma'i'o //
translated: Having made the lotus añjali, one should rotate it in the manner of dancing. This is the Lotus Dance.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu gnyis bya ste 'di ni padma lcags kyu'i'o //🔽kha 'bus pa'i thal mo g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs la g-yas pa'i mdzub mos gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma zhags pa ma'i'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu gnyis bya ste 'di ni padma lcags kyu'i'o // kha 'bus pa'i thal mo g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs la g-yas pa'i mdzub mos gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma zhags pa ma'i'o //
translated: Having made the añjali of sprouts, one should make two hooks with the two index fingers. This is the Lotus Hook.🔽Having made the añjali of sprouts, one should raise the left index finger and hold it with the right index finger. This is the Lotus Noose.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bcings la mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis lu gu rgyud du bcing bar bya ste 'di ni padma lcags sgrog gi'o //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo bcings la mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis lu gu rgyud du bcing bar bya ste 'di ni padma lcags sgrog gi'o //
translated: Having made the añjali of sprouts, one should bind it with the index and thumb fingers in the manner of a chain. This is the Lotus Chain.

original: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo'i mthe bo gnyis rang gi srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi nang du bcug la gzung bar byas te 'di ni padma dril bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo'i mthe bo gnyis rang gi srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi nang du bcug la gzung bar byas te 'di ni padma dril bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The two thumbs of the opened lotus palms are inserted in the space between the ring fingers and the little fingers and held there. This is the pledge seal of the lotus bell.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid chos kyi phyag rgyar gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid chos kyi phyag rgyar gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The Dharma seal should be held as taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: The action seals are bound with the two lotus fists.

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsnyems pa byas nas g-yas pa'i padma'i khu tshur rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsnyems pa byas nas g-yas pa'i padma'i khu tshur rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ba ste /
translated: Having made the haughty pose with the left fist, one should hold the right lotus fist to one’s heart as if entrusting it there.

original: 'di ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the action seal of Vajra Lokeśvara.

original: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis gzhu blang ba'i tshul gyis te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis gzhu blang ba'i tshul gyis te /
translated: With the left lotus fist, one should hold the bow as if drawing it.

original: de nyid snying ga'i phyogs su gyen du kha bltas par gzhag pa de'i steng du g-yas pa'i padma'i khu tshur 'og tu kha bltas par bzhag la slar des mda' gsor pa'i tshul du byas na 'di ni padma yid las byung ba'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid snying ga'i phyogs su gyen du kha bltas par gzhag pa de'i steng du g-yas pa'i padma'i khu tshur 'og tu kha bltas par bzhag la slar des mda' gsor pa'i tshul du byas na 'di ni padma yid las byung ba'i'o //
translated: One should place it in the region of the heart, facing upward. On top of that, one should place the left fist facing downward. Then, with that, one should make the gesture of drawing a bow. This is the lotus born.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis bdag nyid la 'khyud par bya ste /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis bdag nyid la 'khyud par bya ste /
translated: One should embrace oneself with the two lotus fists.

original: 'di ni k'i li k'i la'i'o //🔽padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rgyal @163b mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du bya ste 'di ni padma dran pa'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni k'i li k'i la'i'o // padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rgyal @163b mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du bya ste 'di ni padma dran pa'i'o //
translated: This is the kilikili.🔽With the two lotus fists, one should make the gesture of raising a banner. This is the lotus mindfulness.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis nang du kha bltas pa'i lag pa gnyis dkur gzhag par bya ste 'di ni padma snyems pa'i'o //
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis nang du kha bltas pa'i lag pa gnyis dkur gzhag par bya ste 'di ni padma snyems pa'i'o //
translated: With the two lotus fists, one should place the two hands on one's hips, facing inward. This is the lotus conceit.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa dkrol zhing klog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis g-yas su bskor nas spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i kha sbyor bcings te phab la /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa dkrol zhing klog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis g-yas su bskor nas spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i kha sbyor bcings te phab la /
translated: Form the two lotus fists, and with flirtation, untie the ends, and so on, and with the dance movement of a swaying vine, circle to the right and place the joined kapāla above the head.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
translated: Circle the two lotus fists and bind them.

original: snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis gyen du gtor bar bya ste /
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis gyen du gtor bar bya ste /
translated: Place them at the heart and toss them upward in the manner of offering flowers.

original: 'di ni dpyid ka padma'i'o //🔽de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor la snying ga'i phyogs su bcings te spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis thur du blugs par bya ste 'di ni padma sprin ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dpyid ka padma'i'o // de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor la snying ga'i phyogs su bcings te spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis thur du blugs par bya ste 'di ni padma sprin ma'i'o //
translated: This is the spring lotus.

original: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo gnyis sbyar zhing bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo gnyis sbyar zhing bskor bar bya ste /
translated: Similarly, circle the two lotus fists and bind them at the heart. Pour them down in the manner of offering incense.

original: 'di ni ston ka padma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ston ka padma'i'o //
translated: This is the autumn lotus.🔽Similarly, circle the two lotus fists and bind them.

original: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug pa'i tshul gyis rab tu sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug pa'i tshul gyis rab tu sbyar te /
translated: Likewise, rotate and bind the two lotus fists, extend them toward the heart, and apply them in the manner of anointing with perfume.

original: slar yang padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma dgun ma'i'o //
analyzed: slar yang padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma dgun ma'i'o //
translated: Again, rotate and bind the two lotus fists, and hold them at the crown. This is the padma dhupa.

original: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la snying ga'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la snying ga'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Likewise, rotate and bind the two lotus fists, and hold them at the heart.

original: 'di ni padma sgeg ma'i'o //🔽de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor zhing kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma bzhad ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni padma sgeg ma'i'o // de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor zhing kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma bzhad ma'i'o //
translated: This is the padma gīti.🔽Likewise, rotate and bind the two lotus fists, and hold them at the corners of the mouth in the manner of laughter. This is the padma nṛtyā.

original: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste 'di ni padma glu ma'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste 'di ni padma glu ma'i'o //
translated: Likewise, rotate and bind the two lotus fists, and hold them above the mouth. This is the padma śayā.

original: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni padma gar ma'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni padma gar ma'i'o //
translated: Likewise, rotate and bind two lotus fists, and rotate in the manner of dance; this is the lotus dance.

original: gar dang bral ba'i padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
analyzed: gar dang bral ba'i padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
translated: Form two lotus fists without the dance.

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas te 'di ni padma lcags kyu ma'i'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas te 'di ni padma lcags kyu ma'i'o //
translated: With two hooks of two index fingers, this is the lotus hook.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Form two lotus fists, and with the hook of the right index finger, hold the extended index finger of the left;

original: 'di ni padma zhags pa'i'o//
analyzed: 'di ni padma zhags pa'i'o//
translated: this is the lotus noose.

original: @164a * // padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: @164a * // padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Form two lotus fists, and with the index finger and thumb, form a binding knot;

original: 'di ni padma lcags sgrog ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni padma lcags sgrog ma'i'o //
translated: this is the lotus chain.

original: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te phan tshun du yang dag par sbyar la mthe chung srin lag gi nang du mthe bo gnyis bcug nas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma'i dril bu las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te phan tshun du yang dag par sbyar la mthe chung srin lag gi nang du mthe bo gnyis bcug nas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni padma'i dril bu las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: Having formed the two lotus fists, join them together, and insert the two thumbs into the interior of the small and ring fingers, and hold them. This is the karma-mudra of the lotus bell.

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams zhes bya ba la las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya rnams te de dag brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams zhes bya ba la las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya rnams te de dag brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Then, as for the karma-mudras, the mudras that accomplish the collection of karma are the karma-mudras. They should be expressed, is the meaning.

original: padma chen po bshad do zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni padma chen po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: padma chen po bshad do zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni padma chen po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The great lotus is explained. The mudra that is the pledge of the Blessed One Vajradhatvishvaril is called the great lotus.

original: de bcings nas snying gar gzhag par byas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bcings nas snying gar gzhag par byas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having formed that, if one places it at the heart, all obscurations will be purified.

original: de nyid spyi bo zhes bya ba la padma chen po de nyid bcings la spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar byas na thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //🔽de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po de nyid bcings la rdo rje lta bas blta bar byas na thams cad rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid spyi bo zhes bya ba la padma chen po de nyid bcings la spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar byas na thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro // de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po de nyid bcings la rdo rje lta bas blta bar byas na thams cad rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
translated: That itself is the Great Lotus Crown: form the Great Lotus Seal and hold it to your crown; you will be protected from all.🔽That itself is the Vajra Gaze: form the Great Lotus Seal and gaze with the Vajra Gaze; all will be attracted.

original: de nyid sor mo thams cad la kha phye ba'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po bcings la sor mo thams cad kha phye la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pas gzung bar byas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid sor mo thams cad la kha phye ba'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po bcings la sor mo thams cad kha phye la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pas gzung bar byas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: That itself is the Open Fingers: form the Great Lotus Seal and open all the fingers in the form of the eight lotus petals; you will attain all samadhis.

original: de nyid rdo rje gnyis kyi mig go zhes bya ba la mdzub mos 'khyud pa'i dbus ma'i mig 'bras mthe bo dang sbyar ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gnyis kyi mig ste 'dis bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje gnyis kyi mig go zhes bya ba la mdzub mos 'khyud pa'i dbus ma'i mig 'bras mthe bo dang sbyar ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gnyis kyi mig ste 'dis bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The eye of the two vajras is that which is called the eye of the middle finger embracing the thumb, and the eye of the thumb joined to it. This is the eye of the two vajras, and by this all women will be brought under one's power.

original: 'di nyid legs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po bcings te mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis legs par sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ba ste 'dis skyes pa thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid legs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po bcings te mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis legs par sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ba ste 'dis skyes pa thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the good one. Having formed the great lotus, one should make the gesture of giving with the thumb and the index finger. By this all men will be brought under one's power.

original: de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having made that very [gesture] on the forehead, one should make a request.

original: padma chen po dbral ba'i phyogs su gzung zhing gsol ba gdab par bya ste rmi lam 'debs pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: padma chen po dbral ba'i phyogs su gzung zhing gsol ba gdab par bya ste rmi lam 'debs pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should hold the great lotus in the direction of the forehead and make a request. One will succeed in [causing] dreams.

original: de nyid g-yon pa'i skye gnas su mthe bo'i rtags kyi ming la'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po bcings te @164b g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo skye gnas byas la skye gnas de la g-yas pa'i mthe bo 'og tu kha blta ba bcug ste /
analyzed: de nyid g-yon pa'i skye gnas su mthe bo'i rtags kyi ming la'o zhes bya ba la padma chen po bcings te @164b g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo skye gnas byas la skye gnas de la g-yas pa'i mthe bo 'og tu kha blta ba bcug ste /
translated: That very [mudra] is the lotus of the left [hand], with the name thumb-having bound the great lotus, make the left thumb and forefinger into a lotus, and insert the right thumb into that lotus, facing down.

original: mchog 'dod pa'i bsam pas snying po bzla bar bya ste /
analyzed: mchog 'dod pa'i bsam pas snying po bzla bar bya ste /
translated: With the thought of desiring the supreme, one should recite the essence mantra.

original: de ltar byas na mchog thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na mchog thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does that, all supreme [blessings] will be generated.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
translated: From the Arising of the Perfection of Wisdom-the extensive explanation of the Shriparamādya, the root tantra of the second section-

original: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: the explanation of the Vajra Lokeshvara mudra is complete.

original: // / de ltar rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: // / de ltar rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Having thus taught the Vajra Lokeśvara seal concepts, now, in order to teach the jewel-family seal concepts, [the Bhagavān] declares, Then, the extensive ritual procedure of the jewel-family seal tantra.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word then is as before.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po phyag na gnas pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni nor bu ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po phyag na gnas pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni nor bu ste /
translated: The wish-granting jewel residing in the hand of the noble Ākāśagarbha, as previously explained, is a jewel.

original: de'i rigs ni de las byung ba rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: de'i rigs ni de las byung ba rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: Its family is that which arises from it, the jewel family.

original: de'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams te ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams te ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
translated: Its seals are the great seal, etc., seals. The collection of words that teach it is a tantra.

original: de'i chog rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyun no //
analyzed: de'i chog rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyun no //
translated: The extensive ritual procedure of that is the completion of the great seal, etc.

original: rdo rje thal mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje'i thal mo bcings te mthe bo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas mdzub mo'i rtse mo bsgreng bar byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje'i thal mo bcings te mthe bo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas mdzub mo'i rtse mo bsgreng bar byas la /
translated: The “vajra-palms” mudra and so forth: form the vajra-palms, join the two thumbs, and raise the tips of the index fingers.

original: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo phan tshun du sbyar te steng nas bkug pa rin po cher byas nas mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis su sbyar ba byas te /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo phan tshun du sbyar te steng nas bkug pa rin po cher byas nas mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis su sbyar ba byas te /
translated: With the tips of the two index fingers touching each other, bend them upward to form a jewel, and join the tips of the two thumbs.

original: de nas mdzod spu'i phyogs su gzung bar byas na 'di ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas mdzod spu'i phyogs su gzung bar byas na 'di ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, hold it at the point between the eyebrows: this is the jewel-vajra mudra. This is the entrance to the maṇḍala of the jewel family.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyus bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang bcas pas spyan drangs la dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyus bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang bcas pas spyan drangs la dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: With the same jewel-vajra mudra, use the two index fingers as hooks to invite Lord Ākāśagarbha and his retinue, using the mantra for inviting, and then induct them into the maṇḍala.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba la /🔽rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang las @165a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba la / rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang las @165a * //
translated: All the mudras such as the great mudra are bound just like that.

original: kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bzhin du 'dir yang phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bzhin du 'dir yang phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Just as the great mudra, doctrine mudra, and action mudra are bound in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva, one should understand that here the great mudra, doctrine mudra, and action mudra are bound.

original: dam tshig ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ba'i rtse mo yang dag par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng la /
analyzed: dam tshig ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ba'i rtse mo yang dag par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng la /
translated: The pledge is the index fingers of the vajra binding.🔽Having bound the vajra binding, the tips of the two thumbs are joined in the manner of a perfect union. The two index fingers are extended

original: rtse mo phan tshun yang dag par sbyar te steng nas bkug cing rin po che byas la mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis kyi steng du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: rtse mo phan tshun yang dag par sbyar te steng nas bkug cing rin po che byas la mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis kyi steng du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: and the tips are mutually joined, bent upward, and made into a jewel. The tips of the two thumbs are joined above.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is the pledge seal of the noble Ākāśagarbha called “vajra gem.”🔽The others are born from that.

original: gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'o zhes bya ba la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i rin po che yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'o zhes bya ba la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i rin po che yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The pledge seals of the gems born from the pledge seal of the noble Ākāśagarbha, such as the wish-granting gem, should be taken up.

original: rin po che'i khu tshur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mthe bo yang dag par sbyar zhing bsgreng bar byas la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba'i rtse mo gnyis kyis rang gi mthe bo'i rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: rin po che'i khu tshur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mthe bo yang dag par sbyar zhing bsgreng bar byas la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba'i rtse mo gnyis kyis rang gi mthe bo'i rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The “gem fist” is formed by binding the vajra bond, joining the thumbs, and raising the two index fingers, with the tips of the two index fingers joining at the tip of one’s thumb.

original: 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the seal called “vajra gem fist.”

original: de gnyis su byas la /
analyzed: de gnyis su byas la /
translated: Having made that into two,

original: nor bu'i khu tshur ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nor bu'i khu tshur ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: the “gem fist” is formed.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis su byas na nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis su byas na nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If one makes two vajra-ratna fists, they become two jewel fists.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /🔽g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te gsor la rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste 'di ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te / g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te gsor la rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste 'di ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: snying po'i phyag rgya chen po yin no //
analyzed: snying po'i phyag rgya chen po yin no //
translated: Having taken up the vajra-jewel with the left jewel fist, one takes up the five-pronged vajra marked with a jewel with the right fist, and brandishes it. One should hold it to one's heart in the manner of praising. This is the great seal of Ākāśagarbha.

original: rin po che yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yang rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshan dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs te phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rin po che yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yang rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshan dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs te phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ba yin no //
translated: For those such as Ratnajāṅgula, one should form the great seal in accordance with the respective hand implements drawn with the two jewel fists.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol du mngon par phyogs pa'i lcags kyu ni rin po che yid las byung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol du mngon par phyogs pa'i lcags kyu ni rin po che yid las byung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The pledge seal of the wish-granting jewel is the pledge seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the iron hook turned outward.
