original: 'phags pa @165b nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni k'i li ki la'i'o //🔽'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba nyid mthe bo gnyis kha phye la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dbus ma dag gi rtse mo phan tshun 'dren cing mtha' ma dang srin lag mnyam par bya ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa @165b nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni k'i li ki la'i'o // 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba nyid mthe bo gnyis kha phye la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dbus ma dag gi rtse mo phan tshun 'dren cing mtha' ma dang srin lag mnyam par bya ste /
translated: The seal of Kilikīla is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs embracing.🔽The seal of the jewel mindfulness is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel conceit is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel pride is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.

original: kha phye la rdo rje chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba ni rin po che dran pa'i'o //
analyzed: kha phye la rdo rje chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba ni rin po che dran pa'i'o //
translated: The seal of the jewel arrogance is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel joy is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel delight is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel satisfaction is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel exaltation is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel laughter is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.🔽The seal of the jewel play is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya nyid brla gnyis la bskor zhing gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya nyid brla gnyis la bskor zhing gzhag pa ni /
translated: The seal of the jewel dance is the seal of Ākāśagarbha, with the two thumbs opened and the tips of the two middle fingers crossed and the tips of the two ring fingers even.

original: rin po che snyems pa'i'o //
analyzed: rin po che snyems pa'i'o //
translated: The seal of the jewel song is

original: de nyid steng du gtor ba ni dpyid ka rin po che ma'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid steng du gtor ba ni dpyid ka rin po che ma'i'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnasaumyā is to scatter the flowers above.

original: 'og tu blugs pa ni rin po che sprin ma'i'o //🔽mthe bo gnyis sbyor zhing bskor ba ni ston ka rin po che ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'og tu blugs pa ni rin po che sprin ma'i'o // mthe bo gnyis sbyor zhing bskor ba ni ston ka rin po che ma'i'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnamegha is to scatter the flowers below.🔽The mudra of Ratnavasanta is to join the two thumbs and rotate.

original: rab tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang / bskor zhing spyi bor gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rin chen dgun ma'i'o //
analyzed: rab tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang / bskor zhing spyi bor gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rin chen dgun ma'i'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnahemantā is to extend the thumbs, anoint, rotate, and place on the crown.

original: bskor zhing snying gar gzhag pa ni rin chen sgeg ma'i'o //🔽yongs su bskor zhing dgod pa ni rin po che bzhad ma'i'o //🔽kha las gyen du 'byin pa ni rin chen glu ma'i'o //
analyzed: bskor zhing snying gar gzhag pa ni rin chen sgeg ma'i'o // yongs su bskor zhing dgod pa ni rin po che bzhad ma'i'o // kha las gyen du 'byin pa ni rin chen glu ma'i'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnakeyūrā is to rotate and place on the heart.🔽The mudra of Ratnahasā is to rotate and laugh.🔽The mudra of Ratnagiītā is to raise from the mouth.

original: de bzhin bskor nas gar byed pa ni rin chen gar ma'i'o //🔽mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis ni rin chen lcags kyu ma'i'o //🔽g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas kyis gzung ba ni rin chen zhags pa ma'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bskor nas gar byed pa ni rin chen gar ma'i'o // mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis ni rin chen lcags kyu ma'i'o // g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas kyis gzung ba ni rin chen zhags pa ma'i'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratna nrtyā is to dance while rotating.🔽The mudra of Ratnaṅkuśā is to make two hook-like index fingers.🔽The mudra of Ratna pāśā is to hold the left index finger with the right.

original: mdzub mo'i mthe bong 'ching ba ni rin chen lcags sgrog gi'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo'i mthe bong 'ching ba ni rin chen lcags sgrog gi'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnaśṛṅkhalā is to bind the index fingers and thumbs.

original: mthe bo mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag pa ni rin chen dril bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: mthe bo mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag pa ni rin chen dril bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: Placing it in the innermost part of the thumb is the pledge seal of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid 'dir chos kyi phyag rgya rnams gzung bar bya'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid 'dir chos kyi phyag rgya rnams gzung bar bya'o ;
translated: The Dharma seals are to be held here as taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: / rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings pa las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: / rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings pa las kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: The action seals are to be bound from the two fists of jewels.

original: g-yon pa'i rin po che bsnyems pas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar gzung bar bya ste 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rin po che bsnyems pas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar gzung bar bya ste 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The Bhagavat’s action seal is to hold the jewel at the heart with the left in the manner of holding a jewel, with the right in the manner of pointing.

original: gzhu dang mda' gtod pa ni rin po che yid las byung ba'i'o //
analyzed: gzhu dang mda' gtod pa ni rin po che yid las byung ba'i'o //
translated: The mind-born jewel’s is to point the bow and arrow.

original: 'og tu 'khyud pa ni rin po che k'i li k'i la'i'o //
analyzed: 'og tu 'khyud pa ni rin po che k'i li k'i la'i'o //
translated: The Ratnakīlikīlā’s is to embrace below.

original: rgyal mtshan bsgreng pa ni rin po che dran pa'i'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan bsgreng pa ni rin po che dran pa'i'o //
translated: The Ratnacintā’s is to raise the victory banner.

original: snyems pa gnyis gtod pa ni rin chen snyems pa'i'o //
analyzed: snyems pa gnyis gtod pa ni rin chen snyems pa'i'o //
translated: The Ratnamāna’s is to point the two conceit.

original: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la @166a * //
analyzed: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la @166a * //
translated: Make two precious fists, and with flirtation, release the ends, and so on.

original: sogs pa nas bkrol nas glog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis g-yas phyogs su bskor bas bskor te /
analyzed: sogs pa nas bkrol nas glog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis g-yas phyogs su bskor bas bskor te /
translated: With the dance of a flickering lightning bolt, circle to the right.🔽In the direction of the crown, bind the joined palms in the kapotaka gesture, and lower.

original: spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo kha sbyor ba bcings shing phab la rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing snying gar bcings nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste rin chen dpyid ka ma'i'o //
analyzed: spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo kha sbyor ba bcings shing phab la rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing snying gar bcings nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste rin chen dpyid ka ma'i'o //
translated: Circle the two precious fists, bind at the heart, and scatter above in the manner of offering flowers. This is the mudra of Ratnāgaṇa.

original: de bzhin du rin po che khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
translated: In the same way, circle the two precious fists and bind.

original: spos 'bul pa'i tshul gyis 'og tu ldugs par bya ste 'di ni rin chen sprin ma'i'o //
analyzed: spos 'bul pa'i tshul gyis 'og tu ldugs par bya ste 'di ni rin chen sprin ma'i'o //
translated: Push down below in the manner of offering incense. This is the mudra of Ratnamegha.

original: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
translated: In the same way, circle the two precious fists and bind.

original: mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bor sbyar zhing bskor bar bya ste 'di ni rin chen ston ka ma'i'o //
analyzed: mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bor sbyar zhing bskor bar bya ste 'di ni rin chen ston ka ma'i'o //
translated: Circle the thumbs and touch them in the manner of offering a lamp. This is the mudra of Ratnaśiras.

original: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings te /
translated: Likewise, rotate both jewel fists and bind them.

original: snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug pa'i tshul gyis rab tu sbyar te /
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug pa'i tshul gyis rab tu sbyar te /
translated: Extend them toward the heart and apply them in the manner of anointing.

original: slar yang rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
analyzed: slar yang rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
translated: Again, bind both jewel fists.

original: spyi bo'i phyogs su bskor zhing gzhag par bya ste 'di ni rin chen dgun ma'i'o //
analyzed: spyi bo'i phyogs su bskor zhing gzhag par bya ste 'di ni rin chen dgun ma'i'o //
translated: Rotate them above the crown and place them there. This is the mudra of Ratnasaumyā.

original: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur bskor zhing bcings nas snying ga'i phyogs su bskor zhing gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur bskor zhing bcings nas snying ga'i phyogs su bskor zhing gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, rotate both jewel fists and bind them. Rotate them toward the heart and place them there.

original: 'di ni rin chen sgeg mo'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen sgeg mo'i'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Ratnālaṃkāra.

original: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas dgod pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Likewise, rotate both jewel fists and bind them. Rotate them in the manner of laughter and hold them at the corners of the mouth.

original: 'di ni rin chen bzhad pa ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen bzhad pa ma'i'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Ratnāmṛtā.

original: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur bskor zhing bcings nas kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur bskor zhing bcings nas kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste /
translated: Likewise, rotate both jewel fists and bind them. Raise them up from the mouth.

original: 'di ni rin chen glu ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen glu ma'i'o //
translated: This is the jewel song.

original: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni rin chen gar ma'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni rin chen gar ma'i'o //
translated: Similarly, rotate and bind the two precious fists and rotate them in the manner of dance. This is the jewel dance.

original: gar dang bral ba'i rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas te rin chen lcags kyu'i'o //
analyzed: gar dang bral ba'i rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas te rin chen lcags kyu'i'o //
translated: Bind the two precious fists without dance, and make two hooks with the two index fingers. This is the jewel hook.

original: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings nas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Rotate and bind the two precious fists, and with the right index finger hook the extended left index finger.

original: 'di ni rin chen zhags pa'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen zhags pa'i'o //
translated: This is the jewel noose.

original: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcing bar byas te /
analyzed: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis mdud pa bcing bar byas te /
translated: Bind the two precious fists, and with the index fingers and thumbs make a knot.

original: 'di ni rin chen lcags sgrog gi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen lcags sgrog gi'o //
translated: This is the jewel fetter.

original: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la phan @166b tshun yang dag par sbyar te rang gi srin lag dang mthe chung gi nang du mthe bo gnyis bcug la gzung bar bya ste 'di ni rin chen dril bu'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la phan @166b tshun yang dag par sbyar te rang gi srin lag dang mthe chung gi nang du mthe bo gnyis bcug la gzung bar bya ste 'di ni rin chen dril bu'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: Having formed the two vajra fists, one should join them together, and having inserted the two thumbs into the interior of the ring finger and little finger, one should hold them. This is the karma-mudra of the jewel-ghantā.

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams zhes bya ba la las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams zhes bya ba la las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Then, the karma-mudras are the mudras that accomplish the collection of karma.

original: rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen bcings nas /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen bcings nas /
translated: The vajra-jewel is the entrance mudra. Having bound the vajra-jewel,

original: dbus ma gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar te /
analyzed: dbus ma gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar te /
translated: the tips of the two middle fingers are joined.

original: 'di dbral bar bzhag pas dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dbral bar bzhag pas dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Placing this on the forehead, one will obtain all consecrations.

original: kha gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing mtha' ma gnyis kha thal mo bcings nas /
analyzed: kha gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing mtha' ma gnyis kha thal mo bcings nas /
translated: The tips of the two mouths are joined, and the two ends are opened.

original: srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing mtha' ma gnyis kha phye bar byas la bsgreng ste gzung bar byas na /
analyzed: srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar zhing mtha' ma gnyis kha phye bar byas la bsgreng ste gzung bar byas na /
translated: The tips of the two ring fingers are joined together, and the tips of the two middle fingers are spread apart and raised up.

original: 'dis don thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽dbus ma'i nor bu zhes bya ba la rdo rje rin chen bcings te /
analyzed: 'dis don thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro // dbus ma'i nor bu zhes bya ba la rdo rje rin chen bcings te /
translated: By this, all aims are attained.🔽The “middle jewel” is the vajra jewel.

original: song mo dbus ma gnyis kyis nor bu byas nas /
analyzed: song mo dbus ma gnyis kyis nor bu byas nas /
translated: The two middle fingers are made into a jewel.

original: 'dis 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all desires are fulfilled.

original: mthe'u chung gi rtse mo zhes bya ba la rdo rje rin chen bcings nas /
analyzed: mthe'u chung gi rtse mo zhes bya ba la rdo rje rin chen bcings nas /
translated: The “tip of the little finger” is the vajra jewel.

original: mthe'u chung gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas rtse mor byas na 'dis gter thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas rtse mor byas na 'dis gter thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The two little fingers are joined together and made into a tip. By this, all treasures are found.

original: 'og tu gtor ba zhes bya ba la rdo rje rin chen bcings nas /
analyzed: 'og tu gtor ba zhes bya ba la rdo rje rin chen bcings nas /
translated: The “downward-scattering” is the vajra jewel.

original: de'i 'og tu gtor bar byas na de ltar rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gtor bar byas na de ltar rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is scattered downward. In this way, the vajra empowerment is obtained.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las zhes bya ba la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas rdo rje bsdams pa de las phyag rgya gang dag byung ba de rnams kyi las rnams bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las zhes bya ba la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas rdo rje bsdams pa de las phyag rgya gang dag byung ba de rnams kyi las rnams bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase from the vajra-binding means that having bound the vajra-binding, the actions of those mudras that arise from that vajra-binding are to be performed.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The garland of extended jewel fingers.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba byas la phan tshun sbyar ba'i rtse mo'i steng nas bkug cing nor bur byas te de ltar na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba byas la phan tshun sbyar ba'i rtse mo'i steng nas bkug cing nor bur byas te de ltar na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having bound the vajra-binding, the tips of the two index fingers should be joined together, and having interlaced the tips, they should be bent and made into a jewel.

original: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba snga ma las 'di khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba snga ma las 'di khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between this and the previous vajra empowerment?

original: snga ma ni nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbang bskur ba yin la /
analyzed: snga ma ni nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbang bskur ba yin la /
translated: The previous one is the empowerment of the five-pronged vajra marked with a jewel.

original: 'di ni rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba yin te /
translated: This one is the empowerment of the crown of the jewel-vajra.

original: khyad par ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yin no //
translated: This is the difference.

original: rdo rje rin po che gsum bdun dang logs bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mthe bo dang mdzub mo dang @167a * //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che gsum bdun dang logs bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te mthe bo dang mdzub mo dang @167a * //
translated: One should bind the three vajra gems seven times with the side, meaning one should bind the vajra bond and bind the three vajra gems seven times with the side, binding the thumb, index finger, and middle finger.

original: dbus ma rnams kyis nor bu rin po che gsum byas te /
analyzed: dbus ma rnams kyis nor bu rin po che gsum byas te /
translated: One should bind the three vajra jewels with the seven fingers, means that one should bind the vajra bond, and with the thumbs, index fingers, and middle fingers, one should make three jewels.

original: slar yang spyi bo dang rna ba gnyis kyi steng du gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: slar yang spyi bo dang rna ba gnyis kyi steng du gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Again, one should hold them above the crown and the two ears.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rdo rje rin chen mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud la /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro // rdo rje rin chen mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud la /
translated: In that way, one will obtain the empowerment of the great bodhisattva.

original: dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul du bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul du bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should place the vajra jewel at the point between the eyebrows, and with the tip of the index finger, one should tie it above, and one should make it like the binding of a silk ribbon, means that

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcings la mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo gnyis kyi steng du mdud pa'i tshul du byas na dar dpyangs bcing ba'i rnam pa byas na 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcings la mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo gnyis kyi steng du mdud pa'i tshul du byas na dar dpyangs bcing ba'i rnam pa byas na 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob
translated: Having formed the mudra of the vajra jewel arisen from the vajra-binding, place it in the direction of the brow-mark, and having made a knot above the two index fingers, if one makes the form of a hanging banner,

original: par 'gyur ro //🔽mthe bo gnyis kyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: par 'gyur ro // mthe bo gnyis kyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung zhes bya ba la /
translated: one will obtain the empowerment of the Tathagata.🔽The “firmly bound vajra-binding” is as follows.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis kyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis kyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas te /
translated: Having formed the vajra-binding, make a firm vajra-binding with the two thumbs,

original: mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba bkug cing dbus ma'i sor mo gnyis kyis /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba bkug cing dbus ma'i sor mo gnyis kyis /
translated: and having extended the two index fingers, bend them and with the two middle fingers🔽bend the third joint of the tips.

original: rtse mo'i tshigs gsum pa bkug la ral grir bya ba ni /
analyzed: rtse mo'i tshigs gsum pa bkug la ral grir bya ba ni /
translated: This is the sword.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams te /
translated: With this mudra called “the supreme body of all tathagatas,” beginning from the crown,

original: mdun dang rna ba g-yas pa'i steng gi mgo bo'i steng dang rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du cod pan gyi tshul byas la /
analyzed: mdun dang rna ba g-yas pa'i steng gi mgo bo'i steng dang rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du cod pan gyi tshul byas la /
translated: On the forehead above the right ear, and on the forehead above the left ear, make a topknot.

original: slar yang mdun du phreng ba'i 'ching ba'i tshul gyis mdud pa bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang mdun du phreng ba'i 'ching ba'i tshul gyis mdud pa bya'o //
translated: Again in front, make a knot in the manner of tying a garland.

original: slar yang steng du bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba rna ba gnyis kyi steng du phreng ba chen po 'ching ba'i tshul du byas nas /
analyzed: slar yang steng du bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba rna ba gnyis kyi steng du phreng ba chen po 'ching ba'i tshul du byas nas /
translated: Again, it should be shown above, that is, above both ears, in the manner of tying a great garland.

original: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa dkrol te /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa dkrol te /
translated: With a flirtatious gesture, untie the ends, and so on.

original: logs gnyis su dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul du byas na /
analyzed: logs gnyis su dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul du byas na /
translated: On both sides, make a knot in the manner of tying a silk ribbon.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //🔽dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro // dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa /
translated: If one does this, one will obtain the consecration of Great Vajradhara.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the chapter on the mudra of noble Akashagarbha from the glorious Supreme Original Buddha, known as the perfection of wisdom origin, the second section of the root tantra.

original: // / de ltar 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ltar 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan nas da ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the chapter on the seal of noble Ākāśagarbha, now, in order to teach the chapter on the seals of the concise maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: it is said, “All the vajra concepts are just as before.”

original: rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad de /
analyzed: rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad de /
translated: Since they are all concepts, they are all concepts.

original: ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa rnams so //
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa rnams so //
translated: They are the concepts of Vajrasattva as explained.

original: de rnams bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rtog pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rtog pa ste /
translated: Their accomplishment is the accomplishment of all the great seal and so forth.🔽The tantra that reveals the seal for that purpose is the extensive ritual of that very continuum.

original: de'i don du phyag rgya gang yin pa de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni rgyun de nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa gang yin pa de bshad par bya ba ni bstan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
analyzed: de'i don du phyag rgya gang yin pa de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni rgyun de nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa gang yin pa de bshad par bya ba ni bstan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
translated: That should be explained, should be revealed, by the Blessed One, the great bliss Vajradhara,

original: gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
translated: the secret commitment Vajrasattva.

original: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dmigs kyis dgar ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dmigs kyis dgar ba'o //
translated: The word “there” is a specification.

original: lnga zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya lnga'i rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lnga zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya lnga'i rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “ Five” means that all the concepts of the five seals are accomplished.

original: sku'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba re zhig sku'i phyag rgya rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sku'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba re zhig sku'i phyag rgya rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The “seal of body” is the seal of body that accomplishes all realizations.

original: sku'i phyag rgya de gang yin zhe na phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sku'i phyag rgya de gang yin zhe na phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: What is that seal of body? It is called the “great seal.”

original: phyag rgya chen po de rigs gang la rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po de rigs gang la rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: In which family is that great seal, which accomplishes all realizations, found?

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs so //
translated: It is in the family of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te phyag rgya chen po bcings la rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la dngos grub gang bstan pa de rnams bsgrub par bya'o //🔽dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la zhes bya ba la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te phyag rgya chen po bcings la rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la dngos grub gang bstan pa de rnams bsgrub par bya'o // dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la zhes bya ba la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: This shows that one should accomplish all the powers taught in the Vajrasattva family by binding the great seal.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The “commitment seal” is in the Tathāgata family. One should accomplish all the powers taught in the maṇḍala of the Tathāgatas by binding the commitment seal.🔽The “doctrine seal” is in the Lotus family.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The “action seal” is in the Vajra family.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Binding the Vajra Humkara, one should accomplish all powers as taught in the Vajra Wrathful One of the Supreme Joy Tantra.

original: padma chen po ni padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: padma chen po ni padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Great Lotus is the Lotus Family.

original: padma chan po bcings la @169b rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: padma chan po bcings la @169b rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Binding the Great Lotus, one should accomplish the powers taught in the Vajra Lochanā Tantra.🔽The Vajra Jewel is the Jewel Family.

original: rdo rje nor bu rin po che ni nor bu'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje nor bu rin po che ste /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu rin po che ni nor bu'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje nor bu rin po che ste /
translated: The Vajra Jewel is the mudra of the Blessed Noble Ākāśagarbha, which arises from the Vajra Binding.

original: de bcings la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bcings la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Binding that, one should accomplish the powers taught in the family of the Noble Ākāśagarbha.

original: 'dis ni cho ga rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la /
analyzed: 'dis ni cho ga rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la /
translated: This is for those who fear the fear of extensive rituals.

original: phyag rgya re res rang gi rigs las byung ba'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir man ngag bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya re res rang gi rigs las byung ba'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir man ngag bstan pa yin no //
translated: Each seal is taught as an intimate instruction for accomplishing all powers arising from its own family.

original: rang gi ngag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa bya zhing dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi ngag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa bya zhing dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that one should accomplish all powers by means of one’s own mantra recitation,

original: de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga po ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga po ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Next, the five speech seals . . .”

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word “next” is as before.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ; rdo rje'i rigs dang / padma dang nor bu'i rigs kyi gsung gi dbye bas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga po yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ; rdo rje'i rigs dang / padma dang nor bu'i rigs kyi gsung gi dbye bas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga po yin no //
translated: They are the five speech seals, divided into the speech of Vajrasattva, the Tathāgatas, the Vajra family, the Padma family, and the Jewel family.

original: snyan pa'i glu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: snyan pa'i glu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Sweet song” and so forth.

original: snyan pa'i glu ni de las mkhas pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snyan pa'i glu ni de las mkhas pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: “Sweet song” should be understood from the experts.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag ni /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag ni /
translated: “The speech of the delighted vajra” is

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la ste 'dis sngags brjod cing rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs kyi zlos pa pos phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la ste 'dis sngags brjod cing rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs kyi zlos pa pos phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: In the Vajrasattva family, that is, by this mantra, the reciter of the Vajrasattva family should accomplish the seal, etc.

original: lce dang mchu gnyis cung zad g-yo ba gang la yod pa de ni lce dang mchu gnyis shin tu g-yo ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: lce dang mchu gnyis cung zad g-yo ba gang la yod pa de ni lce dang mchu gnyis shin tu g-yo ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: He who has a slight movement of both tongue and lips is not one with a very moving tongue and lips.

original: so dang mchu shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs bdun dang bral ba'i sgra dang mi ldan pa de ni rdo rje'i dag ste /
analyzed: so dang mchu shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs bdun dang bral ba'i sgra dang mi ldan pa de ni rdo rje'i dag ste /
translated: He who has his teeth and lips not too closed, and who is not endowed with a sound devoid of the seven vowels, is one with a vajra voice.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
translated: In the Tathagata family.

original: rigs thams cad la dgos pa zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la yang 'dir bzlas par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs thams cad la dgos pa zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la yang 'dir bzlas par bya ba yin no //
translated: The need for all families means that in the Vajrasattva family, too, one should recite this mantra.

original: gang gi phyir 'dis kyang thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dis kyang thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ;
translated: Because by this one will attain the powers of all, therefore, the need for all families.

original: sprin gyi 'brug sgra'i yi ge h'um zhes bya ba la sprin bzhin du yi ge h'um 'brug sgra gang las byung ba de ni sprin gyi 'brug sgra'i yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: sprin gyi 'brug sgra'i yi ge h'um zhes bya ba la sprin bzhin du yi ge h'um 'brug sgra gang las byung ba de ni sprin gyi 'brug sgra'i yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The syllable hūṃ of the thunder of the clouds is the syllable hūṃ that arises from the thunder of the clouds, like the clouds.

original: phra mo sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la cung zad tsam gyi sgra gang la yod pa de ni sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: phra mo sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la cung zad tsam gyi sgra gang la yod pa de ni sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The one endowed with the subtle sound is the one who has the sound of a mere little bit.

original: khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsung rdo rje'i @170a * //
analyzed: khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsung rdo rje'i @170a * //
translated: The wrathful vajra is in the family of vajra speech.

original: rigs la'o // ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba la gzhan du ni mi g-yeng ba'i sems kyis yid kyis bzlas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag go //
analyzed: rigs la'o // ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba la gzhan du ni mi g-yeng ba'i sems kyis yid kyis bzlas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag go //
translated: The lotus speech of meditative concentration is in the family of lotus speech.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i padma zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i padma zhes bya ba la /
translated: The lotus of natural purity is the lotus of natural purity.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes pa'i bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni padma ltar dngos por 'dzin pa'i zhen pa dang bral ba yin la /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes pa'i bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni padma ltar dngos por 'dzin pa'i zhen pa dang bral ba yin la /
translated: The meditation that all phenomena are naturally pure is the lotus that is free from attachment to the grasping of entities.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i padma zhes bya bar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i padma zhes bya bar brjod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is called the naturally pure lotus.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa la lhag par mos pa'i rang bzhin can no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa la lhag par mos pa'i rang bzhin can no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the nature of one who is devoted to natural purity, is what is meant.🔽The Dharma speech is in the jewel lineage.

original: chos kyi ngag ni nor bu'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la nor bu'i rigs kyi sgom pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos so //
analyzed: chos kyi ngag ni nor bu'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la nor bu'i rigs kyi sgom pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos so //
translated: The Dharma is the fulfillment of the wishes of all sentient beings through the meditation of the jewel lineage.

original: de ston par byed pa'i ngag gi chos so //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i ngag gi chos so //
translated: The Dharma speech teaches that.

original: de nyid so sor rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / de ltar ston par byed pa dang / de dang rgyu mthun pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid so sor rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / de ltar ston par byed pa dang / de dang rgyu mthun pa ste /
translated: It is the cause for generating the jewel lineage of worship through discernment, and it teaches that in that way, and it is in accord with that.

original: de'i phyir mchod pa'i nor bu'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mchod pa'i nor bu'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the jewel of worship.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following.

original: nor bu'i rigs la lhag par mos pa'i rang bzhin can gyi smra bar 'dod pa ni chos kyi ngag ces bya bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs la lhag par mos pa'i rang bzhin can gyi smra bar 'dod pa ni chos kyi ngag ces bya bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: One who has the nature of being devoted to the jewel lineage and who wishes to speak is called the Dharma speech.

original: de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Then, the five mental seals.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no ;
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no ;
translated: The word “then” is as before.

original: / bsgom par bya ba'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya rnams ni thugs kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: / bsgom par bya ba'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya rnams ni thugs kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The seals that have the nature of meditation are mental seals,

original: sems kyi dmigs pa'i yul rnams so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems kyi dmigs pa'i yul rnams so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because they are the objects of mental observation.

original: de rnams kyang rigs kyi dbye bas lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang rigs kyi dbye bas lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: They are also five in number by way of the divisions of the families.

original: thams cad bsgrub par bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad bsgrub par bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: All are to be accomplished by the meditation of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang las kyis phyag rgya rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu mthun par 'gyur ba bsgom zhing bdag gam gzhan la yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang las kyis phyag rgya rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu mthun par 'gyur ba bsgom zhing bdag gam gzhan la yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
translated: The practitioner of the Vajrasattva family should meditate on the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal of Vajrasattva and so forth, and on the nature of the mind of enlightenment and the concordant causes of the mind of enlightenment, and should bestow the wish-granting jewel on oneself or another.

original: bum pa bzang po la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa bzang po la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on and accomplish all substances such as the excellent vase, etc., as having the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la bcom ldan @170b 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la bcom ldan @170b 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
translated: With the recollection of the Buddha, in the Tathagata lineage, it is said. The Tathagata lineage is the lineage of the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de las bsgrub par bya ba thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin dang / de dang rgyu mthun par gyur pa rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de las bsgrub par bya ba thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin dang / de dang rgyu mthun par gyur pa rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: In that Tathagata lineage, all that is to be accomplished is of the nature of nondual mind, of the nature of the Tathagata, and concordant with that, having the nature of Vajra Weapon, etc. That should be meditated upon by a yogin of that lineage.

original: bdag gam bdag gis mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag gam bdag gis mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should kill oneself or in front of oneself, it is said.

original: rdo rje'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la bdag ni bdag nyid de 'khor ba'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba la bdag ni bdag nyid de 'khor ba'i dngos po'o //
translated: In the Vajra lineage, it is said. The self is one's own, the entity of cyclic existence.

original: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang gi bdag nyid la lhag par mos pas mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang gi bdag nyid la lhag par mos pas mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: By the imagination of his own nature as the Vajra Family, he makes it invisible.

original: yang na mdun du bum pa bzang po la sogs pa bsgrub bya rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du byed pa ni gsod pa ste de ltar bsgom zhing rdo rje'i rigs kyi zlos pa pos bzla bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na mdun du bum pa bzang po la sogs pa bsgrub bya rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du byed pa ni gsod pa ste de ltar bsgom zhing rdo rje'i rigs kyi zlos pa pos bzla bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Or else, in front, he should make the thing to be accomplished, such as the excellent vase, etc., the nature of the Vajra Family, and then kill it, i.e., meditate on it in that way, and the reciter of the Vajra Family should recite.

original: bdag gis spyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sgom pa gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma bdag nyid dam mdun du spyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis spyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sgom pa gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma bdag nyid dam mdun du spyang bar bya ste /
translated: As for I should purify, it is the Lotus Family. One should purify, i.e., remove, the stain of the discursive thought of subject and object, either in oneself or in front, by the meditation on the door of natural purity.

original: sel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ltar padma'i rigs kyi zlos pa pos bsgom par bya zhing bzla bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ltar padma'i rigs kyi zlos pa pos bsgom par bya zhing bzla bar bya ba yin no //
translated: One should do this, i.e., the reciter of the Lotus Family should meditate and recite, I should purify.

original: nam mkha' thams cad kyi bsgom pas nor bu'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa rnams gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsgom par byas te bsgom pa 'dis ni nor bu'i rigs la bzlas pa bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad kyi bsgom pas nor bu'i rigs la'o zhes bya ba dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa rnams gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsgom par byas te bsgom pa 'dis ni nor bu'i rigs la bzlas pa bya ba yin no //
translated: And: The yogin of the Jewel Family should meditate on Akashagarbha and so on as being equal to a reflection, and as being equal to space. By this meditation, one should perform repetition in the Jewel Family.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga po zhes bya ba la rigs lnga'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan ma ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga po zhes bya ba la rigs lnga'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan ma ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Then, the five vajra-seals are the signs of the consecration of the five families, which are the five aspects of that very vajra-seal, by the division of the families.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtse lnga pa'i rdo rje ni rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtse lnga pa'i rdo rje ni rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: The five-pointed vajra and so on. The five-pointed vajra is the five-pointed one.

original: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just this, he says vajra-peak and so on.

original: 'od zer gyi phreng bas yongs su khyab pa ni rtse mo'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa'o //🔽dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po nas snga nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi phreng bas yongs su khyab pa ni rtse mo'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa'o // dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po nas snga nas gnas pa'o //
translated: The radiant garland is the garland of light rays at the tip.
The first is the one who has been present since the beginning of the Fortunate Eon.

original: ba chen po'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba chen po ston par byed pa dang / bde ba chen po thob par byed pas na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: ba chen po'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba chen po ston par byed pa dang / bde ba chen po thob par byed pas na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The great bliss is the cause, the great bliss is the one who reveals, and the great bliss is the one who attains.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rdo rje de rdo rje khu tshur gyis blangs te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rdo rje de rdo rje khu tshur gyis blangs te /
translated: The vajra that is like that is taken up with the vajra fist.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la dbang bskur bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la dbang bskur bar bya ba yin no //
translated: It is the consecration of the lineage of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur blangs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur blangs te /
translated: The five-pronged vajra with light rays is taken up with the tathāgata fist.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: It is the consecration of the lineage of the tathāgatas.

original: 'bar ba'i khro bos rdo rje rtse bzhi pa khro bo'i khu tshur gyis blangs te rdo rje'i rigs la mtshan ma'i dbang bskur par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i khro bos rdo rje rtse bzhi pa khro bo'i khu tshur gyis blangs te rdo rje'i rigs la mtshan ma'i dbang bskur par bya'o //
translated: The four-pronged vajra with blazing wrath is taken up with the wrathful fist. It is the consecration of the sign of the vajra lineage.

original: 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i 'dab ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje padma'i khu tshur gyis blangs te /
analyzed: 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i 'dab ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje padma'i khu tshur gyis blangs te /
translated: Taking up the vajra lotus with the lotus fist at the center of the hub of the sixteen-petaled lotus,

original: padma'i rigs las mtshan ma'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma'i rigs las mtshan ma'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: one should confer empowerment with the sign of the lotus family.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas pa las phyed yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i nang du zhugs pa'i rdo rje phyed pa ni rdo rje rin chen steng du nor bu'i khu tshur gyis blangs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas pa las phyed yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i nang du zhugs pa'i rdo rje phyed pa ni rdo rje rin chen steng du nor bu'i khu tshur gyis blangs te /
translated: The half-vajra, which is half of a five-pronged vajra located at the tip, and which is situated within a wish-fulfilling jewel, is the vajra jewel. Taking it up with the jewel fist on top of the jewel,

original: nor bu'i rigs la dbang bskur bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs la dbang bskur bar bya ba yin no //
translated: one should confer empowerment in the jewel family.

original: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the empowerment of all the families’ seals,🔽now, in order to teach that whatever accomplishment the practitioner desires is to be accomplished by the method of the mind action seal of the essence of the pledge of Vajrasattva,

original: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi snying po'i thugs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis dngos grub gang 'dod pa de nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi snying po'i thugs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis dngos grub gang 'dod pa de nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “the vajra mind,” and so on.

original: de nas rigs thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, the root text says “the tantra of all the families,” and so on.

original: de nas rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud 'dir bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud 'dir bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: “ Then, the tantra of all the families’ conceptual practices should be explained here.”

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word “then” is as before.

original: rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / nor bu'i rigs te /
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / nor bu'i rigs te /
translated: All the families are those of Vajrasattva, the Tathāgatas, the Vajra, the Lotus, and the Jewel.

original: de rnams kyi rtog pa ni ji ltar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rtog pa ni ji ltar bshad pa'o //
translated: Their “concepts” are as explained.

original: de rnams kyi sgrub pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi sgrub pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: In order to teach the special features of the cause of their practice,

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: the root text says “secret,” and so on. It is “secret” because it is not manifest to all people.

original: gang gis kyang dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis kyang dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is “unobstructed” because it cannot be blocked by anyone.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir don yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir don yod pa'o //
translated: It is “effective” because it definitely accomplishes the desired powers.

original: rgyu de 'di @171b ltar gyur pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu de 'di @171b ltar gyur pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that cause like this?

original: de kho na nyid kyi bden pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi bden pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The truth of reality, etc.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi sgra'i rjes su 'gro pa'i shes rab rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi sgra'i rjes su 'gro pa'i shes rab rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni //
translated: The doors of liberation of the natural purity of wisdom, which is the nature of the light of clear understanding that follows the sound of the thought of awakening,

original: de kho na nyid kyi bden pa yin la de'i mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi bden pa yin la de'i mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
translated: are the truth of reality. The supreme of those is the most excellent.

original: myur du dngos grub stsol ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi snying po rjes su chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni /
analyzed: myur du dngos grub stsol ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi snying po rjes su chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni /
translated: Those commitments of Vajrasattva, which are the essence of the commitments that quickly grant powers, are the activities of the seal of passion.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa nges par bsgrub pa'i rgyun no //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa nges par bsgrub pa'i rgyun no //
translated: The extensive ritual of those is the continuity of the accomplishment of the commitments, seals, etc.

original: de nyid 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyun yin pas na /
analyzed: de nyid 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyun yin pas na /
translated: Since that is the continuity of the accomplishment of all desired powers,

original: de'i gsang ba dang / thogs pa med pa dang / don yod pa'i rgyud yin no //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba dang / thogs pa med pa dang / don yod pa'i rgyud yin no //
translated: it is the secret, the unobstructed, and the meaningful tantra.

original: de bshad par bya ba'i zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de bshad par bya ba'i zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One Vajrasattva said, That will be explained.

original: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The great seal of the Blessed One Vajrasattva is the great seal of Vajrasattva.

original: gang yin pa des rtog pa thams cad las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yin pa des rtog pa thams cad las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will attain the powers taught in all the tantras.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go zhes bya ba dang po'i rdo rje ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go zhes bya ba dang po'i rdo rje ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bstan pa yin no //
translated: The pledge of the secret vajra of great bliss is the first vajra, which is taught to be the pledge of great bliss.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught as follows:

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la dngos grub gang dang gang bsgrub par 'dod pa de dang de bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la dngos grub gang dang gang bsgrub par 'dod pa de dang de bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Having bound the first vajra, whatever power one wishes to accomplish, that should be accomplished.

original: don yod pa'i de dang de'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don yod pa'i de dang de'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain the power of that and that without fail.

original: gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The speech seal is called “essence.”

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni gsung gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni gsung gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The essence of Vajrasattva is the speech seal.

original: de bzla zhing rigs thams cad las gsungs pa'i 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzla zhing rigs thams cad las gsungs pa'i 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Reciting that, one should accomplish the desired powers taught in all the families.

original: thugs kyi phyag rgya nye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thugs kyi phyag rgya nye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mind seal is called “near essence.”

original: dngos grub gang dang gang sgrub par byed pa de dang de aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba'i bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub gang dang gang sgrub par byed pa de dang de aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba'i bzlas pa'o //
translated: Whatever powers one accomplishes, one should recite “anurāgāya.”

original: don shes pa bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: don shes pa bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: One should accomplish the knowledge of the meaning.

original: de ltar na rigs thams cad las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rigs thams cad las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, one will attain the powers taught in all the families.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems ma'i'o zhes @172a * //🔽bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems ma'i'o zhes @172a * // bya ba la /
translated: The vajra seal is the vajra conceit.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma ste /
translated: The action seal of Vajrasattva is the vajra conceit.

original: de bcings la rigs thams cad las gsungs pa'i ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bcings la rigs thams cad las gsungs pa'i ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Having bound that, one accomplishes the powers as desired, which are taught in all the tantras.

original: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bzhi pos rtog pa thams cad las gsungs pa'i dngos grub sgrub par bstan nas //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bzhi pos rtog pa thams cad las gsungs pa'i dngos grub sgrub par bstan nas //
translated: Thus, having taught the accomplishment of powers taught in all the tantras by means of the four vajra-mind seals,

original: da ni rigs dang rigs su blta ba'i las kyi dngos grub bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni rigs dang rigs su blta ba'i las kyi dngos grub bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: now, in order to teach the powers of the actions of the various families,

original: phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the subtle action seals, etc.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽phra mo yang de yin la las kyi phyag rgya yang de yin pas na /
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no // phra mo yang de yin la las kyi phyag rgya yang de yin pas na /
translated: The word “then” is as before.🔽They are subtle and they are action seals, thus they are subtle action seals.

original: phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams te blta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams te blta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: They are the viewing seals.

original: de rnams kyi rgyud kyi khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyud kyi khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na //
translated: What is the difference in their tantras?

original: don yod cing thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: don yod cing thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: That which is meaningful and unobstructed is timely.

original: ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having seized her lower lip with one's lips,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs sam //🔽gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya mdun du bkug pa de la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs sam // gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya mdun du bkug pa de la /
translated: one should kiss her with the vajra gaze.🔽One should kiss the lower lip of the one to be accomplished, who is summoned in front, whether of the Vajrasattva family or a yakṣiṇī and so on, with one's lips and teeth.

original: tsumba na'i bsam bas bdag nyid kyi ma mchu so rnams kyis gzung bar bya ste de yang rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing bzlas pa'am bsgom pa byas na thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma thob na skad cig mas so sor nyams su myong bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: tsumba na'i bsam bas bdag nyid kyi ma mchu so rnams kyis gzung bar bya ste de yang rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing bzlas pa'am bsgom pa byas na thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma thob na skad cig mas so sor nyams su myong bar byed pa yin no //
translated: If one does that with the vajra gaze, and performs repetition or meditation, one will obtain the sign of the spiritual powers of universal passion, subjugation, play, and stabilization.

original: sgrub pa la 'jug pa de rigs gang las she na rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs las so //
analyzed: sgrub pa la 'jug pa de rigs gang las she na rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs las so //
translated: If one experiences them individually in an instant, from what family is that one who enters into the practice? It is from the Vajrasattva family.

original: rdo rje phra mo zhes bya ba la sna'i rtse mo nas 'bras kyi tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rnam pa can /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo zhes bya ba la sna'i rtse mo nas 'bras kyi tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rnam pa can /
translated: As for the subtle vajra, it is the form of a five-pointed vajra the size of a grain of barley, at the tip of the nose.

original: sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni phra mo'i rdo rje ste de dang lhan cig tu zhi ba la sogs pa'i lta ba 'dom gang tsam du blta ba gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'i lta ba 'dom gang gi tshad du khyab par byed pa des de bzhin gshegs🔽pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni phra mo'i rdo rje ste de dang lhan cig tu zhi ba la sogs pa'i lta ba 'dom gang tsam du blta ba gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'i lta ba 'dom gang gi tshad du khyab par byed pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: is the view of pacification, etc.

original: lta ba 'di ni rigs gang zhe na /
analyzed: lta ba 'di ni rigs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the family of this view?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las skyes //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las skyes //
translated: It is born from the Tathagata family.

original: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las skyes pa'o //
translated: It is born from the Tathagata family, thus it is born from the Tathagata family.

original: khro @172b bo ston par byed pa'i dbral ba'i phyogs kyi ri mo ni khro gnyer te de dang bcas pa'i khro bo ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs te zhes sdang ngo //
analyzed: khro @172b bo ston par byed pa'i dbral ba'i phyogs kyi ri mo ni khro gnyer te de dang bcas pa'i khro bo ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs te zhes sdang ngo //
translated: The frown is the line on the forehead that shows anger, and the angry one with that is the vajra mind family, which is hatred.

original: des mi bzad pa ste 'jigs par byed pa'i lta ba gang yin pa de byas las shin tu ma mgal bsdams pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa de rdo rje rigs kyi lta bas las rnams byed na thams cad ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang /
analyzed: des mi bzad pa ste 'jigs par byed pa'i lta ba gang yin pa de byas las shin tu ma mgal bsdams pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa de rdo rje rigs kyi lta bas las rnams byed na thams cad ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang /
translated: If one performs the actions of all the yogas that are very loose in their binding, then if one obtains the signs of all the actions—🔽the falling, the descent,

original: rengs ba dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / rgyas btab pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma thob na /
analyzed: rengs ba dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / rgyas btab pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma thob na /
translated: the paralysis, the putting to sleep, the sealing, the killing, and the destruction of the armies of others—

original: skad cig mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skad cig mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will obtain the power of victory over all in an instant.

original: lta ba 'di rigs gang las she na /
analyzed: lta ba 'di rigs gang las she na /
translated: From which family is this view?

original: rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo rdo rje lta ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo rdo rje lta ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is the view of the wrathful vajra of the vajra family.

original: khro bo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs te de'i lta ba ni khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs te de'i lta ba ni khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba'o //
translated: The wrathful vajra is the vajra family, and its view is the view of the wrathful vajra.

original: mig ma btsums pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mig ma btsums pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With eyes not closed and so on.

original: btsums pa med pa'i brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas blta ba'i rnal 'byor pas mchu gnyis mnyam par sbyar nas bzlas pa byas na sgrib pa thams cad spyang ba dang / bsrung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: btsums pa med pa'i brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas blta ba'i rnal 'byor pas mchu gnyis mnyam par sbyar nas bzlas pa byas na sgrib pa thams cad spyang ba dang / bsrung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will attain the power of protection and the actualization of meditative concentration.

original: rigs gang la zhe na /
analyzed: rigs gang la zhe na /
translated: In which family?

original: padma'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: padma'i rigs la'o //
translated: In the lotus family.🔽The yogin who laughs with the blazing gaze,

original: 'bar ba'i lta bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mang du rab tu g-yo ba mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa'i mig gis 'bar ba'i lta bas bzhad pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: 'bar ba'i lta bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mang du rab tu g-yo ba mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa'i mig gis 'bar ba'i lta bas bzhad pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: with eyes that are wide open and darting about,🔽will quickly attain the power of expansion of all consecrations, all goals,

original: dbang bskur ba thams cad dang don thams cad dang / rdzogs pa dang / mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad dang don thams cad dang / rdzogs pa dang / mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro ;
translated: all perfections, and all worship rituals.

original: ; de ltar phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ; de ltar phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the characteristics of binding all the seals, now, in order to teach the meaning of “one should bind all the seals of the pledge seals while reciting the essence mantra of one’s deity,”

original: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba bsgrub pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba bsgrub pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Then, one should accomplish the binding of all the seals.”

original: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad de dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad de dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: Since they are seals and also all, they are all the seals, namely, the pledge seals and so forth.

original: de rnams bcing ba ni phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o //🔽de bsgrub pa ni rang nyid la dbang du bya ba'i phyir /🔽rang gi @173a * //
analyzed: de rnams bcing ba ni phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o // de bsgrub pa ni rang nyid la dbang du bya ba'i phyir / rang gi @173a * //
translated: Binding them is the binding of all the seals.

original: lha'i snying po bzla ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i snying po bzla ba'o //
translated: Accomplishing that is reciting the essence mantra of one’s deity in order to bring it under one’s control.🔽One should recite the essence mantra of one’s deity.

original: nyin re zhes bya ba ni zhag re re la'o //
analyzed: nyin re zhes bya ba ni zhag re re la'o //
translated: Daily means every day.

original: sngon du ni snga ma'i thun mtshams kyi dus su'o //
analyzed: sngon du ni snga ma'i thun mtshams kyi dus su'o //
translated: Previously means at the time of the previous session.

original: lan cig ni lan cig go //
analyzed: lan cig ni lan cig go //
translated: Once is one time.

original: rang gi lha'i snying pos rang nyid bsgrub pa ni bdag nyid bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i snying pos rang nyid bsgrub pa ni bdag nyid bsgrub pa'o //
translated: One should accomplish oneself with the essence mantra of one's deity.

original: rang nyid bsgrub pa 'dis cir 'gyur zhe na / rang gi bcings nas mdor bsdus pas //
analyzed: rang nyid bsgrub pa 'dis cir 'gyur zhe na / rang gi bcings nas mdor bsdus pas //
translated: What is the purpose of accomplishing oneself?🔽By binding oneself with all the seals,

original: phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: all seals are accomplished.

original: zhes bya ba la 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following.

original: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings te de dang de rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing bcing bar byas na /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings te de dang de rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing bcing bar byas na /
translated: Whatever seal of one's deity one binds, one should bind it while reciting the essence mantra of one's deity.

original: 'di ltar phyag rgya de dang rang nyid dam tshig gi bcing bas bcings nas sgrub pa po de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyag rgya de dang rang nyid dam tshig gi bcing bas bcings nas sgrub pa po de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, by binding that seal and oneself with the bond of the pledge, one becomes the master of the seal.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: And all desired accomplishments arise.

original: de ltar rang gi lha'i snying po brjod pas //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi lha'i snying po brjod pas //
translated: Thus, by reciting the essence mantra of one's deity,

original: dang por phyag rgya thams cad bcings te /
analyzed: dang por phyag rgya thams cad bcings te /
translated: first one binds all the seals.

original: phyi nas rang gi lha'i snying po aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes pa 'di dang bcas par bzlas na de rnams grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi nas rang gi lha'i snying po aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes pa 'di dang bcas par bzlas na de rnams grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: If one recites the essence mantra of one's deity along with anurāgayāmi from the outside, they will be accomplished.

original: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To demonstrate this meaning, [the Bhagavān] declares, Then, the accomplishment of the secret of all the seals, and so on.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa /
translated: The accomplishment of the secret of all the seals of all the families, such as the great seal, and so on,

original: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang bcas pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang bcas pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o //
translated: is the expression of the essence mantra of all the families along with the essence mantra called anurāgayāmi.

original: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa //
analyzed: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa //
translated: The essence, seal, mantra, and knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba la snying po ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rigs dang rigs su sngags kyi yi ge rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la snying po ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rigs dang rigs su sngags kyi yi ge rnams so //
translated: The essence is the mantra syllables of the families and subfamilies taught in the great maṇḍala.

original: phyag rgya ni gzungs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni gzungs so //
translated: The seal is the dhāraṇī.
